Граф вызовов:

◆ subdivide_tri_stack() [2/3]

bool Nx::subdivide_tri_stack ( float  shatterArea,
sNGPSVert **  p_write,
NxPs2::CGeomNode *  p_node 
)

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 196

197 {
198  // If there are elements on the stack, pop off the top three vertices and subdivide if necessary.
199  if( triSubdivideStack.IsEmpty())
200  {
201  return false;
202  }
203 
204  // Three temporary buffers.
205  sNGPSVert v0;
206  sNGPSVert v1;
207  sNGPSVert v2;
208 
209  // Stack is LIFO, so Pop() off in reverse order.
210  triSubdivideStack.Pop( &v2 );
211  triSubdivideStack.Pop( &v1 );
212  triSubdivideStack.Pop( &v0 );
213 
214  // Calculate the area of this tri.
215  Mth::Vector p( v1.pos[X] - v0.pos[X], v1.pos[Y] - v0.pos[Y], v1.pos[Z] - v0.pos[Z] );
216  Mth::Vector q( v2.pos[X] - v0.pos[X], v2.pos[Y] - v0.pos[Y], v2.pos[Z] - v0.pos[Z] );
217  Mth::Vector r(( p[Y] * q[Z] ) - ( q[Y] * p[Z] ), ( p[Z] * q[X] ) - ( q[Z] * p[X] ), ( p[X] * q[Y] ) - ( q[X] * p[Y] ));
218  float area_squared = r.LengthSqr();
219 
220  if( area_squared > shatterArea )
221  {
222  // We need to subdivide this tri. Calculate the three intermediate points.
223  int block_size = triSubdivideStack.GetBlockSize();
224 
225  // Three temporary buffers.
226  sNGPSVert i01;
227  sNGPSVert i12;
228  sNGPSVert i20;
229 
230  memcpy( &i01, &v0, block_size );
231  memcpy( &i12, &v1, block_size );
232  memcpy( &i20, &v2, block_size );
233 
234  // Deal with positions (always present).
235  i01.pos[X] = v0.pos[X] + (( v1.pos[X] - v0.pos[X] ) * 0.5f );
236  i01.pos[Y] = v0.pos[Y] + (( v1.pos[Y] - v0.pos[Y] ) * 0.5f );
237  i01.pos[Z] = v0.pos[Z] + (( v1.pos[Z] - v0.pos[Z] ) * 0.5f );
238 
239  i12.pos[X] = v1.pos[X] + (( v2.pos[X] - v1.pos[X] ) * 0.5f );
240  i12.pos[Y] = v1.pos[Y] + (( v2.pos[Y] - v1.pos[Y] ) * 0.5f );
241  i12.pos[Z] = v1.pos[Z] + (( v2.pos[Z] - v1.pos[Z] ) * 0.5f );
242 
243  i20.pos[X] = v2.pos[X] + (( v0.pos[X] - v2.pos[X] ) * 0.5f );
244  i20.pos[Y] = v2.pos[Y] + (( v0.pos[Y] - v2.pos[Y] ) * 0.5f );
245  i20.pos[Z] = v2.pos[Z] + (( v0.pos[Z] - v2.pos[Z] ) * 0.5f );
246 
247  // Deal with colors (not always present).
248  //if( p_node->m_diffuse_offset > 0 )
249  {
250  uint8 *p_v0col = (uint8*)( &(v0.col));
251  uint8 *p_v1col = (uint8*)( &(v1.col));
252  uint8 *p_v2col = (uint8*)( &(v2.col));
253  uint8 *p_i01col = (uint8*)( &(i01.col));
254  uint8 *p_i12col = (uint8*)( &(i12.col));
255  uint8 *p_i20col = (uint8*)( &(i20.col));
256 
257  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
258  {
259  p_i01col[i] = p_v0col[i] + (char)(( p_v1col[i] - p_v0col[i] ) * 0.5f );
260  p_i12col[i] = p_v1col[i] + (char)(( p_v2col[i] - p_v1col[i] ) * 0.5f );
261  p_i20col[i] = p_v2col[i] + (char)(( p_v0col[i] - p_v2col[i] ) * 0.5f );
262  }
263  }
264 
265  // Deal with uv0 (not always present).
266  //if( p_node->m_uv0_offset > 0 )
267  {
268  float *p_v0uv = (float*)( &v0.u );
269  float *p_v1uv = (float*)( &v1.u );
270  float *p_v2uv = (float*)( &v2.u );
271  float *p_i01uv = (float*)( &i01.u );
272  float *p_i12uv = (float*)( &i12.u );
273  float *p_i20uv = (float*)( &i20.u );
274 
275  // We know that v is contiguous to u
276  for( int i = 0; i < 2; ++i )
277  {
278  p_i01uv[i] = p_v0uv[i] + (( p_v1uv[i] - p_v0uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
279  p_i12uv[i] = p_v1uv[i] + (( p_v2uv[i] - p_v1uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
280  p_i20uv[i] = p_v2uv[i] + (( p_v0uv[i] - p_v2uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
281  }
282  }
283 
284  // Push the four new tris onto the stack.
285  triSubdivideStack.Push( &v0 );
286  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i01 );
287  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i20 );
288 
289  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i01 );
290  triSubdivideStack.Push( &v1 );
291  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i12 );
292 
293  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i01 );
294  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i12 );
295  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i20 );
296 
297  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i20 );
298  triSubdivideStack.Push( &i12 );
299  triSubdivideStack.Push( &v2 );
300  }
301  else
302  {
303  // Don't need to subdivide this tri.
304  int block_size = triSubdivideStack.GetBlockSize();
305 
306  // Just copy the tri into the next available slot.
307  memcpy( *p_write, &v0, block_size );
308  (*p_write)++;
309  memcpy( *p_write, &v1, block_size );
310  (*p_write)++;
311  memcpy( *p_write, &v2, block_size );
312  (*p_write)++;
313  }
314  return true;
315 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::sNGPSVert::col, Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::GetBlockSize(), Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::IsEmpty(), Mth::Vector::LengthSqr(), Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::Pop(), Nx::sNGPSVert::pos, Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::Push(), triSubdivideStack, Nx::sNGPSVert::u, X, Y и Z.

323  Mth::Vector cp1 = Mth::CrossProduct( b - a, p1 - a );
324  Mth::Vector cp2 = Mth::CrossProduct( b - a, p2 - a );
325  if( Mth::DotProduct( cp1, cp2 ) >= 0.0f )
326  return true;
327  else
328  return false;

)

Граф вызовов:

◆ line_segment_intersection() [2/3]

static bool Nx::line_segment_intersection ( float  x1,
float  y1,
float  x2,
float  y2,
float  x3,
float  y3,
float  x4,
float  y4 
)
inlinestatic

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 347

348 {
349  float den = (( y4 - y3 ) * ( x2 - x1 )) - (( x4 - x3 ) * ( y2 - y1 ));
350 
351  if( den == 0.0f )
352  {
353  // Parallel lines.
354  return false;
355  }
356 
357  float num_a = (( x4 - x3 ) * ( y1 - y3 )) - (( y4 - y3 ) * ( x1 - x3 ));
358  float num_b = (( x2 - x1 ) * ( y1 - y3 )) - (( y2 - y1 ) * ( x1 - x3 ));
359 
360  num_a /= den;
361  num_b /= den;
362 
363  if(( num_a <= 1.0f ) && ( num_b <= 1.0f ))
364  return true;
365 
366  return false;
367 }

◆ tri_texture_intersect() [2/3]

static bool Nx::tri_texture_intersect ( float  u0,
float  v0,
float  u1,
float  v1,
float  u2,
float  v2 
)
inlinestatic

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 373

374 {
375  // Trivial check to see if all three points are outside range of texture.
376  if(( u0 < -1.0f ) && ( u1 < -1.0f ) && ( u2 < -1.0f ))
377  return false;
378  if(( u0 > 1.0f ) && ( u1 > 1.0f ) && ( u2 > 1.0f ))
379  return false;
380  if(( v0 < -1.0f ) && ( v1 < -1.0f ) && ( v2 < -1.0f ))
381  return false;
382  if(( v0 > 1.0f ) && ( v1 > 1.0f ) && ( v2 > 1.0f ))
383  return false;
384 
385  // Check that at least one corner of the texture falls within the tri.
386  Mth::Vector texture_square[4] = { Mth::Vector( -1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
387  Mth::Vector( 1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
388  Mth::Vector( 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
389  Mth::Vector( -1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f )};
390 
391  Mth::Vector a( u0, v0, 0.0f );
392  Mth::Vector b( u1, v1, 0.0f );
393  Mth::Vector c( u2, v2, 0.0f );
394 
395  for( int p = 0; p < 4; ++p )
396  {
397  if( point_in_triangle( texture_square[p], a, b, c ))
398  {
399  return true;
400  }
401  }
402 
403  // No corners of the texture fall within the tri. There are 3 possible explanations:
404  // 1) The tri intersects the texture, but does not contain a texture corner.
405  // 2) The texture lies entirely outside of the tri.
406  // 3) The tri falls entirely within the texture.
407  // Given the relatively small size of the textures, case (3) is extremely unlikely.
408 
409  // Perform a trivial check to see whether a corner of the tri lies within the texture. This will catch (3) and sometimes (1).
410  if(( u0 >= -1.0f ) && ( u0 <= 1.0f ) && ( v0 >= -1.0f ) && ( v0 <= 1.0f ))
411  return true;
412  if(( u1 >= -1.0f ) && ( u1 <= 1.0f ) && ( v1 >= -1.0f ) && ( v1 <= 1.0f ))
413  return true;
414  if(( u2 >= -1.0f ) && ( u2 <= 1.0f ) && ( v2 >= -1.0f ) && ( v2 <= 1.0f ))
415  return true;
416 
417  // Perform the complete check to see if any line segment forming the tri intersects any line segment forming the texture.
418  for( int p = 0; p < 4; ++p )
419  {
420  int q = ( p + 1 ) % 4;
421  if( line_segment_intersection( u0, v0, u1, v1, texture_square[p][X], texture_square[p][Y], texture_square[q][X], texture_square[q][Y] ))
422  return true;
423  }
424 
425  return false;
426 }

Перекрестные ссылки line_segment_intersection(), point_in_triangle(), Vector(), X и Y.

Граф вызовов:

991  if (p_node->IsLeaf())
992  {
993  Dbg_Assert(num_nodes < MAX_GEOM_NODES);
994 
995  leaf_array[num_nodes++] = p_node;
996  return;
997  } else {
998  NxPs2::CGeomNode *p_child;
999  for (p_child = p_node->GetChild(); p_child; p_child = p_child->GetSibling())
1000  {

1002  }
1003  }

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ get_num_extra_shatter_tris()

int Nx::get_num_extra_shatter_tris ( float  shatterArea,
const Mth::Vector &  pos0,
const Mth::Vector &  pos1,
const Mth::Vector &  pos2 
)

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 1011

1012 {
1013  int num_extra_tris = 0;
1014 
1015  // Figure the area of this tri.
1016  Mth::Vector p( pos1[X] - pos0[X], pos1[Y] - pos0[Y], pos1[Z] - pos0[Z], 0.0f );
1017  Mth::Vector q( pos2[X] - pos0[X], pos2[Y] - pos0[Y], pos2[Z] - pos0[Z], 0.0f );
1018  Mth::Vector r(( p[Y] * q[Z] ) - ( q[Y] * p[Z] ), ( p[Z] * q[X] ) - ( q[Z] * p[X] ), ( p[X] * q[Y] ) - ( q[X] * p[Y] ), 0.0f);
1019  float area_squared = r.LengthSqr();
1020 
1021  if( area_squared > shatterArea )
1022  {
1023  //Dbg_Message("Area of triangle: %f", sqrtf(area_squared));
1024 
1025  // We will need to subdivide - each subdivision will result in an area one quarter the previous area
1026  // (and thusly the square of the area will be one sixteenth the previous area).
1027  num_extra_tris = 1;
1028  while( area_squared > shatterArea )
1029  {
1030  num_extra_tris *= 4;
1031  area_squared *= ( 1.0f / 16.0f );
1032  }
1033 
1034  // This original tri will not be added...
1035  // ...however, the subdivided versions will.
1036  num_extra_tris--;
1037  //Dbg_Message("Adding %d triangles", num_extra_tris);
1038  }
1039 
1040  return num_extra_tris;
1041 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mth::Vector::LengthSqr(), X, Y и Z.

◆ AllocateToLeaf()

static OctNode* Nx::AllocateToLeaf ( PalQuant *  pq,
OctNode *  root,
OctantMap  Octs,
int  depth 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 119

120 {
121 
122  Dbg_Assert(pq);
123  Dbg_Assert(root);
124 
125  /* return leaf */
126  if (depth == 0)
127  {
128  return(root);
129  }
130 
131  /* populate branch */
132  if (!root->Branch.dir[Octs & 15])
133  {
134  OctNode *node;
135 
136  node = CreateCube();//(pq->cubefreelist);
137  root->Branch.dir[Octs & 15] = node;
138  if (depth == 1)
139  {
140  InitLeaf(&node->Leaf);
141  }
142  else
143  {
144  InitBranch(&node->Branch);
145  }
146  }
147 
148  return(AllocateToLeaf
149  (pq, root->Branch.dir[Octs & 15], Octs >> 4, depth - 1));
150 }

Граф вызовов:

◆ PalQuantAddImage()

void Nx::PalQuantAddImage ( PalQuant *  pq,
uint8 *  img,
int  width,
int  height,
int  image_bpp,
float  weight 
)

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 154

155 {
156  int i, size;//, stride;
157  //unsigned char *pixels;
158 
159  Dbg_Assert(pq);
160  Dbg_Assert(img);
161 
162  //pixels = (unsigned char*) texture->buf;//GetTexelData( 0 );
163  size = width * height;
164 
165  switch (image_bpp / 8)
166  {
167  case 3:
168  {
169 #if 0
170  Image::RGBA color;
171  ColorReal rColor;
172  OctNode *leaf;
173  OctantMap Octs;
174 
175  color24* colors= (color24*)img;
176  for( i = 0; i < size; i++ )
177  {
178  color.red = colors[i].r;
179  color.green = colors[i].g;
180  color.blue = colors[i].b;
181  color.alpha = 255;
182 
183  /* build down to leaf */
184  Octs = GetOctAdr(&color);
185  leaf = AllocateToLeaf(pq, pq->root, Octs, MAXDEPTH);
186 
187  ColorRealFromColorInt(&rColor, &color);
188  leaf->Leaf.weight += weight;
189  ColorRealScale(&rColor, &rColor, weight);
190  ColorRealAdd(&leaf->Leaf.ac, &leaf->Leaf.ac,
191  &rColor);
192  leaf->Leaf.m2 += weight*ColorRealLengthSq(&rColor);
193  }
194 #endif
195  Dbg_Assert(0);
196  break;
197  }
198  case 4:
199  {
200  Image::RGBA color;
201  ColorReal rColor;
202  OctNode *leaf;
203  OctantMap Octs;
204 
205  uint32* p_colors= (uint32*)img;
206  for( i = 0; i < size; i++ )
207  {
208  color = *((Image::RGBA *) &p_colors[i]);
209 
210  /* build down to leaf */
211  Octs = GetOctAdr(&color);
212  leaf = AllocateToLeaf(pq, pq->root, Octs, MAXDEPTH);
213 
214  ColorRealFromColorInt(&rColor, &color);
215  leaf->Leaf.weight += weight;
216  ColorRealScale(&rColor, &rColor, weight);
217  ColorRealAdd(&leaf->Leaf.ac, &leaf->Leaf.ac,
218  &rColor);
219  leaf->Leaf.m2 += weight*ColorRealLengthSq(&rColor);
220  }
221  break;
222  }
223 
224  default:
225  break;
226  }
227 }

Перекрестные ссылки AllocateToLeaf(), Image::RGBA::b, Image::RGBA::g, GetOctAdr(), Image::RGBA::r и Nx::PalQuant::root.

Используется в GeneratePalette().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ assignindex()

static void Nx::assignindex ( OctNode *  root,
Image::RGBA *  origin,
int  depth,
box *  region,
int  palIndex 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 233

235 {
236  int width, dr, dg, db, da, dR, dG, dB, dA;
237  int i;
238 
239  Dbg_Assert(origin);
240  Dbg_Assert(region);
241 
242  if (!root)
243  return;
244 
245  width = 1 << depth;
246 
247  dr = origin->r - region->col1.r;
248  dg = origin->g - region->col1.g;
249  db = origin->b - region->col1.b;
250  da = origin->a - region->col1.a;
251  if (dr >= 0 || dg >= 0 || db >= 0 || da >= 0)
252  {
253  return;
254  }
255 
256  dR = region->col0.r - origin->r;
257  dG = region->col0.g - origin->g;
258  dB = region->col0.b - origin->b;
259  dA = region->col0.a - origin->a;
260  if (dR >= width || dG >= width || dB >= width || dA >= width)
261  {
262  return;
263  }
264 
265  /* wholly inside region and a leaf? */
266  if (dr <= -width && dg <= -width && db <= -width && da <= -width)
267  if (dR <= 0 && dG <= 0 && dB <= 0 && dA <= 0)
268  if (depth == 0)
269  {
270  root->Leaf.palIndex = (unsigned char) palIndex;
271  return;
272  }
273 
274  /* try children */
275  depth--;
276  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
277  {
278  Image::RGBA suborigin;
279 
280  suborigin.r = origin->r + (((i >> 3) & 1) << depth);
281  suborigin.g = origin->g + (((i >> 2) & 1) << depth);
282  suborigin.b = origin->b + (((i >> 1) & 1) << depth);
283  suborigin.a = origin->a + (((i >> 0) & 1) << depth);
284 
285  assignindex(root->Branch.dir[i], &suborigin, depth, region, palIndex);
286  }
287 }

Перекрестные ссылки Image::RGBA::a, Image::RGBA::b, Nx::box::col0, Nx::box::col1, db, Image::RGBA::g и Image::RGBA::r.

Используется в nAssign().

)

297  Dbg_Assert(root);
298  Dbg_Assert(cube);
299 
300  origin.r = 0;
301  origin.g = 0;
302  origin.b = 0;
303  origin.a = 0;

◆ addvolume()

static void Nx::addvolume ( OctNode *  root,
Image::RGBA *  origin,
int  depth,
box *  region,
LeafNode *  volume 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 309

311 {
312  int width, dr, dg, db, da, dR, dG, dB, dA;
313  int i;
314 
315  Dbg_Assert(origin);
316  Dbg_Assert(region);
317 
318  if (!root)
319  return;
320 
321  width = 1 << depth;
322 
323  dr = origin->r - region->col1.r;
324  dg = origin->g - region->col1.g;
325  db = origin->b - region->col1.b;
326  da = origin->a - region->col1.a;
327  if (dr >= 0 || dg >= 0 || db >= 0 || da >= 0)
328  {
329  return;
330  }
331 
332  dR = region->col0.r - origin->r;
333  dG = region->col0.g - origin->g;
334  dB = region->col0.b - origin->b;
335  dA = region->col0.a - origin->a;
336  if (dR >= width || dG >= width || dB >= width || dA >= width)
337  {
338  return;
339  }
340 
341  /* wholly inside region? */
342  if (dr <= -width && dg <= -width && db <= -width && da <= -width)
343  if (dR <= 0 && dG <= 0 && dB <= 0 && dA <= 0)
344 #ifndef CACHEWEIGHTS
345  if (depth == 0) /* we need to visit each leaf */
346 #endif
347  {
348  volume->weight += root->Leaf.weight;
349  ColorRealAdd(&volume->ac, &volume->ac, &root->Leaf.ac);
350  volume->m2 += root->Leaf.m2;
351  return;
352  }
353 
354  /* try children */
355  depth--;
356  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
357  {
358  Image::RGBA suborigin;
359 
360  suborigin.r = origin->r + (((i >> 3) & 1) << depth);
361  suborigin.g = origin->g + (((i >> 2) & 1) << depth);
362  suborigin.b = origin->b + (((i >> 1) & 1) << depth);
363  suborigin.a = origin->a + (((i >> 0) & 1) << depth);
364 
365  addvolume(root->Branch.dir[i], &suborigin, depth, region, volume);
366  }
367 }

◆ nMaximize()

static float Nx::nMaximize ( OctNode *  root,
box *  cube,
int  dir,
int *  cut,
LeafNode *  whole 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 417

419 {
420  box infcube;
421  LeafNode left, right;
422  float maxsum, val, lastval;
423  int i;
424 
425  Dbg_Assert(root);
426  Dbg_Assert(cube);
427  Dbg_Assert(cut);
428  Dbg_Assert(whole);
429 
430  lastval = maxsum = 0.0f;
431  *cut = -1;
432  infcube = *cube;
433  switch (dir)
434  {
435  case RED:
436  for (i = cube->col0.r; i < cube->col1.r; i++)
437  {
438  infcube.col1.r = (unsigned char) i;
439 
440  nVol(&left, root, &infcube);
441  ColorRealSub(&right.ac, &whole->ac, &left.ac);
442  right.weight = whole->weight - left.weight;
443  if ((left.weight > 0.0f) && (right.weight > 0.0f))
444  {
445  val = ColorRealLengthSq(&left.ac) / left.weight;
446  val += ColorRealLengthSq(&right.ac) / right.weight;
447 
448  if (val > maxsum)
449  {
450  maxsum = val;
451  *cut = i;
452  }
453  else if (val < lastval)
454  {
455  /* we've past the peak */
456  break;
457  }
458 
459  lastval = val;
460  }
461  }
462  break;
463 
464  case GREEN:
465  for (i = cube->col0.g; i < cube->col1.g; i++)
466  {
467  infcube.col1.g = (unsigned char) i;
468 
469  nVol(&left, root, &infcube);
470  ColorRealSub(&right.ac, &whole->ac, &left.ac);
471  right.weight = whole->weight - left.weight;
472  if ((left.weight > 0.0f) && (right.weight > 0.0f))
473  {
474  val = ColorRealLengthSq(&left.ac) / left.weight;
475  val += ColorRealLengthSq(&right.ac) / right.weight;
476 
477  if (val > maxsum)
478  {
479  maxsum = val;
480  *cut = i;
481  }
482  else if (val < lastval)
483  {
484  /* we've past the peak */
485  break;
486  }
487 
488  lastval = val;
489  }
490  }
491  break;
492 
493  case BLUE:
494  for (i = cube->col0.b; i < cube->col1.b; i++)
495  {
496  infcube.col1.b = (unsigned char) i;
497 
498  nVol(&left, root, &infcube);
499  ColorRealSub(&right.ac, &whole->ac, &left.ac);
500  right.weight = whole->weight - left.weight;
501  if ((left.weight > 0.0f) && (right.weight > 0.0f))
502  {
503  val = ColorRealLengthSq(&left.ac) / left.weight;
504  val += ColorRealLengthSq(&right.ac) / right.weight;
505 
506  if (val > maxsum)
507  {
508  maxsum = val;
509  *cut = i;
510  }
511  else if (val < lastval)
512  {
513  /* we've past the peak */
514  break;
515  }
516 
517  lastval = val;
518  }
519  }
520  break;
521 
522  case ALPHA:
523  for (i = cube->col0.a; i < cube->col1.a; i++)
524  {
525  infcube.col1.a = (unsigned char) i;
526 
527  nVol(&left, root, &infcube);
528  ColorRealSub(&right.ac, &whole->ac, &left.ac);
529  right.weight = whole->weight - left.weight;
530  if ((left.weight > 0.0f) && (right.weight > 0.0f))
531  {
532  val = ColorRealLengthSq(&left.ac) / left.weight;
533  val += ColorRealLengthSq(&right.ac) / right.weight;
534 
535  if (val > maxsum)
536  {
537  maxsum = val;
538  *cut = i;
539  }
540  else if (val < lastval)
541  {
542  /* we've past the peak */
543  break;
544  }
545 
546  lastval = val;
547  }
548  }
549  break;
550  }
551 
552  return(maxsum);
553 }

Перекрестные ссылки Image::RGBA::a, Nx::LeafNode::ac, Image::RGBA::b, Nx::box::col0, Nx::box::col1, Image::RGBA::g, nVol(), Image::RGBA::r и Nx::LeafNode::weight.

Используется в nCut().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ nCut()

static bool Nx::nCut ( OctNode *  root,
box *  set1,
box *  set2 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 557

558 {
559  int cutr, cutg, cutb, cuta;
560  float maxr, maxg, maxb, maxa;
561  LeafNode whole;
562 
563  Dbg_Assert(root);
564  Dbg_Assert(set1);
565  Dbg_Assert(set2);
566 
567  nVol(&whole, root, set1);
568  maxr = nMaximize(root, set1, RED, &cutr, &whole);
569  maxg = nMaximize(root, set1, GREEN, &cutg, &whole);
570  maxb = nMaximize(root, set1, BLUE, &cutb, &whole);
571  maxa = nMaximize(root, set1, ALPHA, &cuta, &whole);
572 
573  /* did we find any splits? */
574  if ( (maxr == 0.0f) &&
575  (maxg == 0.0f) &&
576  (maxb == 0.0f) &&
577  (maxa == 0.0f) )
578  {
579  return false;
580  }
581 
582  *set2 = *set1;
583 
584  /* NEED TO CHECK FOR ALPHA TOO */
585 
586  if (maxr >= maxg)
587  {
588  if (maxr >= maxb)
589  {
590  if (maxr >= maxa)
591  {
592  set1->col1.r = set2->col0.r = (unsigned char) cutr;
593  }
594  else
595  {
596  set1->col1.a = set2->col0.a = (unsigned char) cuta;
597  }
598  }
599  else
600  {
601  if (maxb >= maxa)
602  {
603  set1->col1.b = set2->col0.b = (unsigned char) cutb;
604  }
605  else
606  {
607  set1->col1.a = set2->col0.a = (unsigned char) cuta;
608  }
609  }
610  }
611  else if (maxg >= maxb)
612  {
613  if (maxg >= maxa)
614  {
615  set1->col1.g = set2->col0.g = (unsigned char) cutg;
616  }
617  else
618  {
619  set1->col1.a = set2->col0.a = (unsigned char) cuta;
620  }
621  }
622  else if (maxb >= maxa)
623  {
624  set1->col1.b = set2->col0.b = (unsigned char) cutb;
625  }
626  else
627  {
628  set1->col1.a = set2->col0.a = (unsigned char) cuta;
629  }
630 
631 
632  return true;
633 }

Перекрестные ссылки Image::RGBA::a, Image::RGBA::b, Nx::box::col0, Nx::box::col1, Image::RGBA::g, nMaximize(), nVol() и Image::RGBA::r.

Используется в PalQuantResolvePalette().

Граф вызовов:

◆ CalcNodeWeights()

static LeafNode* Nx::CalcNodeWeights ( OctNode *  root,
int  depth 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 638

639 {
640  LeafNode *Leaf;
641  int i;
642 
643  Leaf = NULL;
644  if (root)
645  {
646  Leaf = &root->Leaf;
647 
648  /* is it a branch? */
649  if (depth > 0)
650  {
651  InitLeaf(Leaf);
652  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
653  {
654  LeafNode *SubNode =
655  CalcNodeWeights(root->Branch.dir[i], depth - 1);
656 
657  if (SubNode)
658  {
659  Leaf->weight += SubNode->weight;
660  ColorRealAdd(&Leaf->ac, &Leaf->ac, &SubNode->ac);
661  Leaf->m2 += SubNode->m2;
662  }
663  }
664  }
665  }
666 
667  return(Leaf);
668 }

Используется в PalQuantResolvePalette().

Граф вызовов:

◆ CountLeafs()

static int Nx::CountLeafs ( OctNode *  root,
int  depth 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 673

674 {
675  int i, n;
676 
677  n = 0;
678  if (root)
679  {
680  /* is it a branch? */
681  if (depth > 0)
682  {
683  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
684  {
685  n += CountLeafs(root->Branch.dir[i], depth - 1);
686  }
687  }
688  else
689  {
690  n = 1;
691  }
692  }
693 
694  return(n);
695 }

)

705  {

709  if (depth > 0)
710  {

◆ PalQuantResolvePalette() [1/2]

int Nx::PalQuantResolvePalette ( Image::RGBA *  palette,
int  maxcols,
PalQuant *  pq 
)

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 747

748 {
749  int numcols, uniquecols, i, k, next;
750 
751 #if (defined(RWDEBUG))
752  if (256 < maxcols)
753  {
754  RWMESSAGE(("256 < %d == maxcols", (int) maxcols));
755  }
756 #endif /* (defined(RWDEBUG)) */
757 
758 
759  Dbg_Assert(palette);
760  Dbg_Assert(maxcols <= 256);
761  Dbg_Assert(pq);
762 
763  numcols = maxcols;
764  uniquecols = CountLeafs(pq->root, MAXDEPTH);
765  if (numcols > uniquecols)
766  {
767  numcols = uniquecols;
768  }
769 
770 #ifdef CACHEWEIGHTS
771  /* cache weightings at every node */
772  CalcNodeWeights(pq->root, MAXDEPTH);
773 #endif
774 
775  /* divide and conquer */
776  pq->Mcube[0].col0.r = 0;
777  pq->Mcube[0].col0.g = 0;
778  pq->Mcube[0].col0.b = 0;
779  pq->Mcube[0].col0.a = 0;
780  pq->Mcube[0].col1.r = 1 << MAXDEPTH;
781  pq->Mcube[0].col1.g = 1 << MAXDEPTH;
782  pq->Mcube[0].col1.b = 1 << MAXDEPTH;
783  pq->Mcube[0].col1.a = 1 << MAXDEPTH;
784  pq->Mvv[0] = nVar(pq->root, &pq->Mcube[0]);
785  for (i = 1; i < numcols; i++)
786  {
787  float maxvar;
788 
789  /* find best box to split */
790  next = -1;
791  maxvar = 0.0f;
792  for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
793  {
794  if (pq->Mvv[k] > maxvar)
795  {
796  maxvar = pq->Mvv[k];
797  next = k;
798  }
799  }
800 
801  /* stop if we couldn't find a box to split */
802  if (next == -1)
803  {
804  break;
805  }
806 
807  /* split box */
808  if (nCut(pq->root, &pq->Mcube[next], &pq->Mcube[i]))
809  {
810  /* volume test ensures we won't try to cut one-cell box */
811  pq->Mvv[next] = nVar(pq->root, &pq->Mcube[next]);
812  pq->Mvv[i] = nVar(pq->root, &pq->Mcube[i]);
813  }
814  else
815  {
816  /* don't try to split this box again */
817  pq->Mvv[next] = 0.0f;
818  i--;
819  }
820  }
821 
822  /* extract the new palette */
823  for (k = 0; k < maxcols; k++)
824  {
825  if (k < numcols)
826  {
827  LeafNode Node;
828 
829  nAssign(k, pq->root, &pq->Mcube[k]);
830  nVol(&Node, pq->root, &pq->Mcube[k]);
831  node2pal(&palette[k], &Node);
832  }
833  else
834  {
835  palette[k].r = 0;
836  palette[k].g = 0;
837  palette[k].b = 0;
838  palette[k].a = 0;
839  }
840  }
841 
842  return(numcols);
843 }

Перекрестные ссылки Image::RGBA::a, Image::RGBA::b, CalcNodeWeights(), Nx::box::col0, Nx::box::col1, CountLeafs(), Image::RGBA::g, Nx::PalQuant::Mcube, Nx::PalQuant::Mvv, nAssign(), nCut(), nVar(), nVol(), Image::RGBA::r и Nx::PalQuant::root.

Используется в GeneratePalette().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ GetIndex()

static unsigned char Nx::GetIndex ( OctNode *  root,
OctantMap  Octs,
int  depth 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 848

849 {
850  unsigned char result;
851 
852  Dbg_Assert(root);
853 
854  if (depth == 0)
855  {
856  result = root->Leaf.palIndex;
857  }
858  else
859  {
860  result = GetIndex(root->Branch.dir[Octs & 15], Octs >> 4, depth - 1);
861  }
862 
863  return(result);
864 }

◆ PalQuantInit()

bool Nx::PalQuantInit ( PalQuant *  pq)

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 869

870 {
871  int i, j, maxval;
872 
873  Dbg_Assert(pq);
874  Dbg_Assert(!p_splice);
875 
876  p_splice = (OctantMap *) Mem::Malloc(sizeof(OctantMap) * MAXCOLOR);
877 
878  /* lookup mapping (8) bit-patterns to every 4th bit b31->b00 (least to most) */
879  maxval = 1 << MAXDEPTH;
880  for (i = 0; i < maxval; i++)
881  {
882  OctantMap mask = 0;
883 
884  for (j = 0; j < MAXDEPTH; j++)
885  {
886  mask |= (i & (1 << j)) ? (1 << ((MAXDEPTH - 1 - j) * 4)) : 0;
887  }
888  p_splice[i] = mask;
889  }
890 
891  pq->Mcube = (box *) Mem::Calloc(sizeof(box), MAXCOLOR);
892  pq->Mvv = (float *) Mem::Calloc(sizeof(float), MAXCOLOR);
893 
894  pq->root = CreateCube();
895  InitBranch(&pq->root->Branch);
896 
897  return true;
898 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mem::Calloc(), CreateCube(), InitBranch(), Mem::Malloc(), Nx::PalQuant::Mcube, Nx::PalQuant::Mvv, p_splice и Nx::PalQuant::root.

Используется в GeneratePalette().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ DeleteOctTree()

static void Nx::DeleteOctTree ( PalQuant *  pq,
OctNode *  root,
int  depth 
)
static

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 902

903 {
904  int i;
905 
906  Dbg_Assert(pq);
907 
908  if (root)
909  {
910  /* is it a branch? */
911  if (depth > 0)
912  {
913  for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
914  {
915  DeleteOctTree(pq, root->Branch.dir[i], depth - 1);
916  }
917  }
918 
919  Mem::Free(root);
920  }
921 }

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ GeneratePalette()

void Nx::GeneratePalette ( Image::RGBA *  p_palette,
uint8 *  src_image,
int  width,
int  height,
int  image_bpp,
int  max_colors 
)

См. определение в файле PaletteGen.cpp строка 942

943 {
944  int num_colors;
945  PalQuant pal_quant;
946 
947  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap());
948 
949  if( !PalQuantInit( &pal_quant ))
950  {
951  return;
952  }
953 
954  PalQuantAddImage( &pal_quant, src_image, width, height, image_bpp, 1 );
955 
956  // Create a palette for all of the mips
957  num_colors = PalQuantResolvePalette( p_palette, max_colors, &pal_quant );
958 
959  // And swizzle for the PS2
960  Image::RGBA temp_rgba;
961  for (int j=0; j<256; j+=32)
962  {
963  for (int k=0; k<8; k++)
964  {
965  temp_rgba = p_palette[j+k+8];
966  p_palette[j+k+8] = p_palette[j+k+16];
967  p_palette[j+k+16] = temp_rgba;
968  }
969  }
970 
971 
972  PalQuantTerm( &pal_quant );
973 
974  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
975 }

Перекрестные ссылки PalQuantAddImage(), PalQuantInit(), PalQuantResolvePalette(), PalQuantTerm(), Mem::Manager::PopContext(), Mem::Manager::PushContext() и Mem::Manager::sHandle().

Используется в Nx::CPs2Texture::plat_combine_textures() и Nx::CPs2Texture::plat_put_32bit_image_into_texture().

◆ ScriptLoadFont()

bool Nx::ScriptLoadFont ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxFontMan.cpp строка 135

136 {
137  bool is_buttons_font = pParams->ContainsFlag("buttons_font");
138 
139  const char *p_name;
140 
141 
142  if (!pParams->GetText(NONAME, &p_name) && !is_buttons_font)
143  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no font specified"));
144 
145 
146  if (is_buttons_font)
147  {
148  #ifdef __PLAT_XBOX__
149  p_name = "ButtonsXbox";
150  #else
151  #ifdef __PLAT_NGC__
152  p_name = "ButtonsNgc";
153  #else
154  p_name = "ButtonsPs2";
155  #endif
156  #endif
157  }
158 
159  Mem::PushMemProfile((char*)p_name);
160 
161  float char_spacing = 0;
162  pParams->GetFloat("char_spacing", &char_spacing);
163 
164  float space_spacing = 0;
165  pParams->GetFloat("space_spacing", &space_spacing);
166 
167  Script::CArray *p_script_col_tab;
168 
169  // 15Jan02 JCB - Make this local to avoid fragmentation when allocating from the heap.
170  Image::RGBA rgba_tab[16];
171  Image::RGBA* p_rgba_tab = &rgba_tab[0];
172 
173  if (pParams->GetArray("color_tab", &p_script_col_tab))
174  {
175  for (int i = 0; i < (int) p_script_col_tab->GetSize() && i < 16; i++)
176  {
177  Script::CArray *p_entry = p_script_col_tab->GetArray(i);
178  uint32 rgba = 0;
179  int size = p_entry->GetSize();
180  Dbg_MsgAssert(size >= 3 && size <= 4, ("wrong size %d for color array", size));
181  for (int j = 0; j < size; j++)
182  {
183  rgba |= (p_entry->GetInteger(j) & 255) << (j*8);
184  }
185  p_rgba_tab[i] = *((Image::RGBA *) &rgba);
186  }
187  }
188 
189  Nx::CFontManager::sLoadFont(p_name, (int) char_spacing, (int) space_spacing, p_rgba_tab, is_buttons_font);
190 
191  Mem::PopMemProfile();
192 
193  return true;
194 }

Перекрестные ссылки Script::CArray::GetArray(), Script::CArray::GetInteger(), Script::CArray::GetSize(), Mem::PopMemProfile(), Mem::PushMemProfile() и Nx::CFontManager::sLoadFont().

◆ ScriptSetLightDirection()

bool Nx::ScriptSetLightDirection ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxLightMan.cpp строка 611

612 {
613  int index;
614  if (!pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x7f8c98fe,"index"), &index))
615  {
616  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find 'index' of light"));
617  }
618 
619  float heading, pitch;
620  Mth::Vector direction(0, 0, 1, 0);
621  if (pParams->GetVector(CRCD(0xc1b52e4c,"direction"), &direction))
622  {
623  direction[W] = 0.0f; // This is the only way to force this to be a vector (as opposed to a point)
624  //Dbg_Message("************ direction (%f, %f, %f)", direction[X], direction[Y], direction[Z]);
625  } else if (pParams->GetFloat(CRCD(0xfd4bc03e,"heading"), &heading) && pParams->GetFloat(CRCD(0xd8604126,"pitch"), &pitch)) {
626  direction.RotateX(Mth::DegToRad(pitch));
627  direction.RotateY(Mth::DegToRad(heading));
628  //Dbg_Message("************ heading and pitch direction (%f, %f, %f)", direction[X], direction[Y], direction[Z]);
629  } else {
630  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find 'direction' or 'heading' and 'pitch' of light"));
631  }
632 
633  return CLightManager::sSetLightDirection(index, direction);
634 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mth::DegToRad(), Mth::Vector::RotateX(), Mth::Vector::RotateY(), Nx::CLightManager::sSetLightDirection() и W.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptDrawDirectionalLightLines()

bool Nx::ScriptDrawDirectionalLightLines ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxLightMan.cpp строка 727

728 {
729  float heading;
730  pParams->GetFloat( CRCD(0xfd4bc03e,"heading"), &heading, Script::ASSERT );
731 
732  float pitch;
733  pParams->GetFloat( CRCD(0xd8604126,"pitch"), &pitch, Script::ASSERT );
734 
735  pitch = -pitch * Mth::PI / 180.0f;
736  heading = ((-heading+90) * Mth::PI / 180.0f);
737 
738  int r, g, b;
739  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x93f60062,"r"), &r, Script::ASSERT );
740  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0xfe2be489,"g"), &g, Script::ASSERT );
741  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x8e411006,"b"), &b, Script::ASSERT );
742  Image::RGBA rgb(r, g, b, 0x80);
743  //rgb = CLightManager::sGetLightDiffuseColor(0);
744 
745  Obj::CSkater *pSkater = Mdl::Skate::Instance()->GetLocalSkater();
746 
747  Mth::Vector pos = pSkater->GetPos();
748  float x = pos.GetX();
749  float y = ( pos.GetY() + 75 );
750  float z = pos.GetZ();
751 
752  float hypyh = 50;
753 
754  float y0 = ( (sin(pitch) * hypyh) + y );
755  float hypxz = (cos(pitch) * hypyh);
756  float x0 = ( (cos(heading) * hypxz) + x );
757  float z0 = ( (sin(heading) * hypxz) + z );
758 
759  Mth::Vector skaterpos(x, y, z, 0);
760  Mth::Vector direction0(x0, y0, z0, 0);
761 
762  //printf("x=%i y=%i z=%i\n", direction0[0], direction0[1], direction0[2]);
763 
764  Gfx::AddDebugLine( skaterpos, direction0, MAKE_RGB( rgb.r, rgb.g, rgb.b ), MAKE_RGB( rgb.r, rgb.g, rgb.b ), 1 );
765 
766  return true;
767 }

Перекрестные ссылки Gfx::AddDebugLine(), Script::ASSERT, Image::RGBA::b, cos(), Image::RGBA::g, Obj::CCompositeObject::GetPos(), Mth::Vector::GetX(), Mth::Vector::GetY(), Mth::Vector::GetZ(), Mth::PI, Image::RGBA::r, sin(), x и y.

306  }
307 
308  Image::RGBA rgb(r, g, b, 0x80);
309 
310  CLoadScreen::sSetLoadingBarBorderColor(rgb);
311 
312  return true;
313 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::CLoadScreen::sSetLoadingBarBorderColor().

Граф вызовов:

◆ MiscFXCleanup()

void Nx::MiscFXCleanup ( void  )

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 252

253 {
254  // Can cleanup the screen flash details here, since they are not platform specific.
255  p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateStart();
256  sScreenFlashDetails *p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
257  while( p_details )
258  {
259  sScreenFlashDetails *p_delete = p_details;
260  p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
261 
262  p_screen_flash_details_table->FlushItem((uint32)p_delete );
263  delete p_delete;
264  }
265 
266  // Ditto for the tetxure splat trail details.
267  KillAllTextureSplats();
268 
269  // Clean up the shatter details.
270  plat_shatter_cleanup();
271 }

281  // This was split into a separate function because it can also be used after turning geometry off,
282  // to ensure no splats are 'floating'.

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ ScreenFlashUpdate()

void Nx::ScreenFlashUpdate ( void  )

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 341

342 {
343  float framelength = Tmr::FrameLength();
344 
345  if( p_screen_flash_details_table )
346  {
347  p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateStart();
348  sScreenFlashDetails *p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
349  while( p_details )
350  {
351  sScreenFlashDetails *p_delete = NULL;
352 
353  // Don't process if paused.
354  if( !Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance()->GamePaused() || ( p_details->m_flags & Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_IGNORE_PAUSE ))
355  {
356  p_details->m_lifetime -= framelength;
357  if( p_details->m_lifetime > 0.0f )
358  {
359  // Calculate the current color.
360  float mult = p_details->m_lifetime / p_details->m_duration;
361  p_details->m_current.r = p_details->m_to.r + (int)(((float)p_details->m_from.r - (float)p_details->m_to.r ) * mult );
362  p_details->m_current.g = p_details->m_to.g + (int)(((float)p_details->m_from.g - (float)p_details->m_to.g ) * mult );
363  p_details->m_current.b = p_details->m_to.b + (int)(((float)p_details->m_from.b - (float)p_details->m_to.b ) * mult );
364  p_details->m_current.a = p_details->m_to.a + (int)(((float)p_details->m_from.a - (float)p_details->m_to.a ) * mult );
365  }
366  else
367  {
368  p_delete = p_details;
369  }
370  }
371 
372  p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
373 
374  if( p_delete )
375  {
376  p_screen_flash_details_table->FlushItem((uint32)p_delete );
377  delete p_delete;
378  }
379  }
380  }
381 }

Перекрестные ссылки Image::RGBA::a, Image::RGBA::b, Tmr::FrameLength(), Image::RGBA::g, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_current, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_duration, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_flags, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_from, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_lifetime, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_to, p_screen_flash_details_table, Image::RGBA::r и SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_IGNORE_PAUSE.

Используется в Nx::CEngine::sRenderWorld().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ ScreenFlashRender()

void Nx::ScreenFlashRender ( int  viewport,
uint32  flags 
)

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 389

390 {
391  p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateStart();
392  sScreenFlashDetails *p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
393  while( p_details )
394  {
395  if( viewport == p_details->m_viewport )
396  {
397  if(( flags & Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_BEHIND_PANEL ) == ( p_details->m_flags & Nx::SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_BEHIND_PANEL ))
398  {
399  plat_screen_flash_render( p_details );
400  }
401  }
402  p_details = p_screen_flash_details_table->IterateNext();
403  }
404 }

Перекрестные ссылки Gfx::flags, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_flags, Nx::sScreenFlashDetails::m_viewport, p_screen_flash_details_table, plat_screen_flash_render() и SCREEN_FLASH_FLAG_BEHIND_PANEL.

Граф вызовов:

◆ TextureSplatUpdate()

void Nx::TextureSplatUpdate ( void  )

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 412

413 {
414  // Don't process if paused.
415  if( Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance()->GamePaused() && !Replay::RunningReplay())
416  {
417  return;
418  }
419 
420  if( p_splat_details_table )
421  {
422  int framelength_in_ms = (int)( Tmr::FrameLength() * 1000.0f );
423 
424  p_splat_details_table->IterateStart();
425  sSplatInstanceDetails *p_details = p_splat_details_table->IterateNext();
426  while( p_details )
427  {
428  // Initialize to -1 to indicate no active splats so far.
429  p_details->m_highest_active_splat = -1;
430 
431  for( int i = 0; i < SPLAT_POLYS_PER_MESH; ++i )
432  {
433  if( p_details->m_lifetimes[i] > 0 )
434  {
435  p_details->m_lifetimes[i] -= framelength_in_ms;
436  if( p_details->m_lifetimes[i] <= 0 )
437  {
438  // Make sure to set lifetime back to exactly zero to indicate ready for re-use.
439  p_details->m_lifetimes[i] = 0;
440 
441  // This splat has just 'expired'. Reset this poly.
442  plat_texture_splat_reset_poly( p_details, i );
443  }
444  else
445  {
446  p_details->m_highest_active_splat = i;
447  }
448  }
449  }
450  p_details = p_splat_details_table->IterateNext();
451  }
452  }
453 }

Перекрестные ссылки Tmr::FrameLength(), Nx::sSplatInstanceDetails::m_highest_active_splat, Nx::sSplatInstanceDetails::m_lifetimes, p_splat_details_table, plat_texture_splat_reset_poly() и Replay::RunningReplay().

Используется в Nx::CEngine::sRenderWorld().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ TextureSplat()

bool Nx::TextureSplat ( Mth::Vector &  splat_start,
Mth::Vector &  splat_end,
float  size,
float  lifetime,
const char *  p_texture_name,
uint32  trail 
)

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 461

462 {
463  Replay::WriteTextureSplat(splat_start,splat_end,size,lifetime,p_texture_name,trail);
464 
465  // If this is a flagged as a trail splat, see if we have a trail instance already that matches.
466  sSplatTrailInstanceDetails *p_trail_details = NULL;
467  if( trail > 0 )
468  {
469  uint32 time = Tmr::GetTime();
470 
471  p_splat_trail_details_table->IterateStart();
472  p_trail_details = p_splat_trail_details_table->IterateNext();
473  while( p_trail_details )
474  {
475  sSplatTrailInstanceDetails *p_delete = NULL;
476 
477  if(( time < p_trail_details->m_last_pos_added_time ) || (( time - p_trail_details->m_last_pos_added_time ) > 500 ))
478  {
479  // This trail is over half a second old - remove it.
480  p_delete = p_trail_details;
481  }
482  else
483  {
484  // This trail had a point added within the last half second, so check it for bone ID.
485  if( p_trail_details->m_trail_id == trail )
486  {
487  // ID's match, so check it for proximity. Seems like fast moving reverts can cause successive calls to be up to 5.5 feet away.
488  float sq_dist = ( splat_start - p_trail_details->m_last_pos ).LengthSqr();
489  if( sq_dist < ( 66.0f * 66.0f ))
490  {
491  // This trail had a point added within the last half second that is within 3 feet of this point. Select this trail.
492  break;
493  }
494  }
495  }
496 
497  p_trail_details = p_splat_trail_details_table->IterateNext();
498 
499  if( p_delete )
500  {
501  p_splat_trail_details_table->FlushItem((uint32)p_delete );
502  delete p_delete;
503  }
504  }
505 
506  // If there were no trail details, create a new instance and just return.
507  if( p_trail_details == NULL )
508  {
509  p_trail_details = new sSplatTrailInstanceDetails;
510  p_trail_details->m_trail_id = trail;
511  p_trail_details->m_last_pos = splat_start;
512  p_trail_details->m_last_pos_added_time = time;
513  p_splat_trail_details_table->PutItem((uint32)p_trail_details, p_trail_details );
514  return true;
515  }
516  }
517 
518  // Convert the name string to a checksum.
519  uint32 texture_checksum = Crc::GenerateCRCFromString( p_texture_name );
520 
521  // Obtain a pointer to the texture.
522  Nx::CTexture *p_texture = Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->GetTexture( texture_checksum );
523  Dbg_MsgAssert( p_texture, ("Couldn't find texture %s in particle texture dictionary", p_texture_name) );
524 
525  Mth::Line is( splat_start, splat_end );
526 
527  // Make initial line bounding box.
528  Mth::CBBox line_bbox( is.m_start );
529  line_bbox.AddPoint( is.m_end );
530 
531  // Get a list of all collision sectors within all super sectors that the line intersects.
532  // This is a very fast call, but likely to provide many collision sectors that are not actually within the
533  // bounding box of the line.
534  SSec::Manager *ss_man = Nx::CEngine::sGetNearestSuperSectorManager( is );
535  Nx::CCollStatic **pp_coll_obj_list = ss_man->GetIntersectingCollSectors( is );
536 
537  // Can't create blood splat if no objects found.
538  if( !pp_coll_obj_list )
539  {
540  return false;
541  }
542 
543  // The sector table is used to pass a platform independent set of CSector pointers to the below p-line code.
544  // Garrett: Also added static collision table, just in case CSector points to a CCollMulti
545  #define SECTOR_TABLE_SIZE 127
546  static CSector* sector_table[SECTOR_TABLE_SIZE + 1];
547  static Nx::CCollStatic* collision_table[SECTOR_TABLE_SIZE + 1];
548 
549  int sector_table_index = 0;
550  Nx::CCollStatic *p_coll_obj;
551  while(( p_coll_obj = *pp_coll_obj_list ))
552  {
553  if( p_coll_obj->GetGeometry())
554  {
555  // Determine whether this collision sector actually falls within the bounding box of our line.
556  if( p_coll_obj->GetGeometry()->GetBBox().Intersect( line_bbox ))
557  {
558  uint32 checksum = p_coll_obj->GetChecksum();
559 
560  // From the checksum we can get the CSector (the renderable version) from the hash table of the scene.
561  Nx::CSector *p_sector = Nx::CEngine::sGetSector( checksum );
562 
563  // Store the pointer in the table.
564  Dbg_Assert( sector_table_index < SECTOR_TABLE_SIZE );
565  collision_table[sector_table_index] = p_coll_obj;
566  sector_table[sector_table_index++] = p_sector;
567  }
568  ++pp_coll_obj_list;
569  }
570  }
571 
572  // Mark the end of the sector table with a NULL pointer.
573  if( sector_table_index > 0 )
574  {
575  sector_table[sector_table_index] = NULL;
576  collision_table[sector_table_index] = NULL;
577 
578  // Make sure we can can calculate an up vector. If not, just move on.
579  bool rv;
580  if ((trail == 0) || (splat_start[X] != p_trail_details->m_last_pos[X]) || (splat_start[Z] != p_trail_details->m_last_pos[Z]))
581  {
582  rv = plat_texture_splat( sector_table, collision_table, splat_start, splat_end, size, lifetime, p_texture, p_trail_details );
583  } else {
584  rv = false;
585  }
586 
587  // Update the trail details if present.
588  if( p_trail_details )
589  {
590  p_trail_details->m_last_pos = splat_start;
591  p_trail_details->m_last_pos_added_time = Tmr::GetTime();
592  }
593 
594  return rv;
595  }
596 
597  return false;
598 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mth::CBBox::AddPoint(), Crc::GenerateCRCFromString(), Nx::CCollObjTriData::GetBBox(), Nx::CCollObj::GetChecksum(), Nx::CCollObj::GetGeometry(), SSec::Manager::GetIntersectingCollSectors(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), Tmr::GetTime(), Mth::CBBox::Intersect(), LengthSqr(), Mth::Line::m_end, Nx::sSplatTrailInstanceDetails::m_last_pos, Nx::sSplatTrailInstanceDetails::m_last_pos_added_time, Mth::Line::m_start, Nx::sSplatTrailInstanceDetails::m_trail_id, p_splat_trail_details_table, plat_texture_splat(), Nx::CEngine::sGetNearestSuperSectorManager(), Nx::CEngine::sGetSector(), Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict, Replay::WriteTextureSplat(), X и Z.

Используется в Obj::CVehicleComponent::draw_shadow(), Obj::CSkeletonComponent::SpawnTextureSplat() и Replay::sReadFrame().

Граф вызовов:

void Nx::ShatterSetParams ( Mth::Vector &  velocity,

float  spread_factor,
float  lifetime,
float  bounce,
float  bounce_amplitude 
)

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 619

620 {
621  Replay::WriteShatterParams(velocity, area_test, velocity_variance, spread_factor, lifetime, bounce, bounce_amplitude);
622 
623  shatterVelocity = velocity;
624  shatterAreaTest = ( area_test == 0.0f ) ? ( DEFAULT_AREA_TEST * DEFAULT_AREA_TEST ) : ( area_test * area_test );
625  shatterVelocityVariance = ( velocity_variance == 0.0f ) ? DEFAULT_VELOCITY_VARIANCE : velocity_variance;
626  shatterSpreadFactor = ( spread_factor == 0.0f ) ? DEFAULT_SPREAD_FACTOR : spread_factor;
627  shatterLifetime = ( lifetime == 0.0f ) ? DEFAULT_LIFETIME : lifetime;
628  shatterBounce = ( bounce == 0.0f ) ? DEFAULT_BOUNCE : bounce;

630 }

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ ShatterUpdate()

void Nx::ShatterUpdate ( void  )

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 652

653 {
654  // Don't process if paused.
655  if( Mdl::FrontEnd::Instance()->GamePaused() && !Replay::RunningReplay())
656  {
657  return;
658  }
659  if (Replay::Paused())
660  {
661  return;
662  }
663 
664  if( p_shatter_details_table )
665  {
666  float framelength = Tmr::FrameLength();
667 
668  p_shatter_details_table->IterateStart();
669  sShatterInstanceDetails *p_details = p_shatter_details_table->IterateNext();
670  while( p_details )
671  {
672  sShatterInstanceDetails *p_delete = NULL;
673 
674  p_details->m_lifetime -= framelength;
675  if( p_details->m_lifetime <= 0.0f )
676  {
677  // Remove this entry from the table and destroy at the bottom of the loop.
678  p_delete = p_details;
679  }
680  else
681  {
682  plat_shatter_update( p_details, framelength );
683  }
684  p_details = p_shatter_details_table->IterateNext();
685 
686  if( p_delete )
687  {
688  p_shatter_details_table->FlushItem((uint32)p_delete );
689  delete p_delete;
690  }
691  }
692  }
693 }

Перекрестные ссылки Tmr::FrameLength(), Nx::sShatterInstanceDetails::m_lifetime, p_shatter_details_table, Replay::Paused(), plat_shatter_update() и Replay::RunningReplay().

Используется в Nx::CEngine::sRenderWorld().

Граф вызовов:

◆ ShatterRender()

void Nx::ShatterRender ( void  )

См. определение в файле NxMiscFX.cpp строка 701

702 {

704  {

707  while( p_details )

Граф вызовов:

◆ extrema()

static Mth::Vector Nx::extrema ( Mth::Vector  p0,
Mth::Vector  p1,
Mth::Vector  p2,
float  t1,
float  t2 
)
static

См. определение в файле NxNewParticle.cpp строка 90

94 {
95  Mth::Vector r = p0;
96 
97  if( p1[X] < p0[X] )
98  r[X] = p1[X];
99  if( p1[Y] < p0[Y] )
100  r[Y] = p1[Y];
101  if( p1[Z] < p0[Z] )
102  r[Z] = p1[Z];
103  if( p1[W] < p0[W] )
104  r[W] = p1[W];
105 
106  return r;
107 }
108 
109 /******************************************************************/

Перекрестные ссылки p0, p1, W, X, Y и Z.

◆ componentwise_min()

Mth::Vector &  p1 
)

◆ process_particles()

void Nx::process_particles ( float  delta_time)

См. определение в файле nxparticlemgr.cpp строка 14

15 {
16 // plat_process_particles( delta_time );
17  if( CEngine::sGetParticleTable() )
18  {
19  CParticle *p_particle;
20  CEngine::sGetParticleTable()->IterateStart();
21  while(( p_particle = CEngine::sGetParticleTable()->IterateNext()))
22  {
23  if ( p_particle->IsActive() ) p_particle->process( delta_time );
24  }
25  }
26 }

◆ create_particle()

CParticle * Nx::create_particle ( uint32  checksum,
uint32  type_checksum,
int  max_particles,
int  max_streams,
uint32  texture_checksum,
uint32  blendmode_checksum,
int  fix,
int  num_segments,
float  split,
int  history,
int  perm 
)

См. определение в файле nxparticlemgr.cpp строка 52

53 {
54  // Types to add:
55  // 1. Flat color quad
56  // 2. Gouraud quad
57  // 3. n sided glow (center color + outer color)
58  // 4. n sided 2 layer glow ( center color + mid color + outer color)
59  // 5. n spiked star (center color + mid color + spike color)
60  // 6. Lines (current color + previous color)
61  // 7. Ribbons - volumetric lines made from quads (current color + previous color)
62 
63  CParticle *p_particle = plat_create_particle( checksum, type_checksum, max_particles, max_streams, texture_checksum, blendmode_checksum, fix, num_segments, split, history );
64 
65  p_particle->SetPerm(perm);
66 
67  p_particle->SetActive( true );
68  p_particle->SetEmitting( false ); // This is already set to false, this si just a reminder
69 
70  // Add to our list of particles.
71  CEngine::sGetParticleTable()->PutItem( checksum, p_particle );
72  return p_particle;
73 }

Перекрестные ссылки plat_create_particle(), Nx::CParticle::SetActive(), Nx::CParticle::SetEmitting(), Nx::CParticle::SetPerm() и Nx::CEngine::sGetParticleTable().

Граф вызовов:

76 {

78  CEngine::sGetParticleTable()->FlushItem( checksum ); // remove reference from hash table
79  delete p; // deleted particle, will remove itself from the table
80 }

См. определение в файле NxQuickAnim.cpp строка 71

◆ get_rotation_from_key()

void Nx::get_rotation_from_key ( Gfx::CAnimQKey *  p_in,
Mth::Quat *  pQuat,
bool  isHiRes 
)
inline

См. определение в файле NxQuickAnim.cpp строка 81

87  {
88  (*pQuat)[X] = quatDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimQKey*)p_in)->qx );
89  (*pQuat)[Y] = quatDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimQKey*)p_in)->qy );
90  (*pQuat)[Z] = quatDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimQKey*)p_in)->qz );
91 // (*pQuat)[W] = quatDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimQKey*)p_in)->qw );
92  }
93 
94  float qx = (*pQuat)[X];
95  float qy = (*pQuat)[Y];
96  float qz = (*pQuat)[Z];
97 
98  // Dave note: added 09/12/02 - a simple check to ensure we don't try to take the square root of a negative
99  // number, which will hose Nan-sensitive platforms later on...
100  float sum = 1.0f - qx * qx - qy * qy - qz * qz;
101  (*pQuat)[W] = sqrtf (( sum < 0.0f ) ? 0.0f : sum );
102 
103  if ( p_in->signBit )
104  {
105  (*pQuat)[W] = -(*pQuat)[W];
106  }
107 }
108 
109 /******************************************************************/
110 /* */
111 /* */

Mth::Vector *  pVector,
bool  isHiRes 
)
inline

См. определение в файле NxQuickAnim.cpp строка 118

124  {
125  (*pVector)[X] = transDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimTKey*)p_in)->tx, 32.0f );
126  (*pVector)[Y] = transDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimTKey*)p_in)->ty, 32.0f );
127  (*pVector)[Z] = transDown( ((Gfx::CStandardAnimTKey*)p_in)->tz, 32.0f );
128  (*pVector)[W] = 1.0f;
129  }
130 }

◆ interpolate_q_frame()

void Nx::interpolate_q_frame ( Mth::Quat *  p_out,
Gfx::CAnimQKey *  p_in1,
Gfx::CAnimQKey *  p_in2,
float  alpha,
bool  isHiRes 
)
inline

См. определение в файле NxQuickAnim.cpp строка 153

159  {
160  // don't need to slerp, because it's the start time
161  *p_out = qIn1;
162  return;
163  }
164 
165  Mth::Quat qIn2;
166  get_rotation_from_key( p_in2, &qIn2, isHiRes );
167 
168  if ( alpha == 1.0f )
169  {
170  // don't need to slerp, because it's the end time
171  *p_out = qIn2;
172  return;
173  }
174 
175  // fast slerp, stolen from game developer magazine
176  *p_out = Mth::FastSlerp( qIn1, qIn2, alpha );
177 }
178 
179 /******************************************************************/
180 /* */
181 /* */

◆ interpolate_t_frame()

void Nx::interpolate_t_frame ( Mth::Vector *  p_out,
Gfx::CAnimTKey *  p_in1,
Gfx::CAnimTKey *  p_in2,
float  alpha,
bool  isHiRes 
)
inline

См. определение в файле NxQuickAnim.cpp строка 188

195  {
196  // don't need to lerp, because it's the start time
197  *p_out = tIn1;
198  return;
199  }
200 
201  Mth::Vector tIn2;
202  get_translation_from_key( p_in2, &tIn2, isHiRes );
203 
204  if ( alpha == 1.0f )
205  {
206  // don't need to slerp, because it's the end time
207  *p_out = tIn2;
208  return;
209  }
210 
211  /* Linearly interpolate positions */
212  *p_out = Mth::Lerp( tIn1, tIn2, alpha );
213 }
214 
216 // Stub versions of all platform specific functions are provided here:
217 // so engine implementors can leave certain functionality until later

◆ ScriptLoadTexture()

bool Nx::ScriptLoadTexture ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 179

180 {
181  const char *p_name;
182  if (!pParams->GetText(NONAME, &p_name))
183  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
184 
185  bool alloc_vram = true;
186  if (pParams->ContainsFlag(CRCD(0x3955ff2e,"no_vram_alloc")))
187  {
188  alloc_vram = false;
189  }
190 
191  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->LoadTexture(p_name, true, alloc_vram);
192 
193  return p_texture != NULL;
194 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::CTexDict::LoadTexture() и Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptUnloadTexture()

bool Nx::ScriptUnloadTexture ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 200

201 {
202  CTexture *p_texture = NULL;
203  const char *p_name;
204  uint32 checksum;
205 
206  if (pParams->GetText(NONAME, &p_name))
207  {
208  // get texture based on string
209  p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(p_name);
210  }
211  else if (pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
212  {
213  // get texture based on checksum
214  p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
215  }
216  else
217  {
218  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified in %s", pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
219  }
220 
221  if (p_texture)
222  {
223  CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->UnloadTexture(p_texture);
224  }
225  else
226  {
227  if ( !pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x3d92465e,"dont_assert") ) )
228  {
229  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to unload", p_name));
230  }
231  }
232 
233  return true;
234 }

Перекрестные ссылки Script::CScript::GetScriptInfo(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict и Nx::CTexDict::UnloadTexture().

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptLoadFaceTextureFromProfile()

bool Nx::ScriptLoadFaceTextureFromProfile ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 280

281 {
282  bool alloc_vram = true;
283  uint32 checksum;
284  pParams->GetChecksum( "checksum", &checksum, Script::ASSERT );
285 
286  // Copy the downloaded face for use as a sprite
287  Mdl::Skate* skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
288  Obj::CSkaterProfile* pSkaterProfile = skate_mod->GetCurrentProfile();
289  Dbg_Assert( pSkaterProfile );
290  Dbg_MsgAssert( !pSkaterProfile->IsPro(), ( "Can only map face onto a custom skater. UI must make the custom skater active before this point" ) );
291  Gfx::CModelAppearance* pAppearance = pSkaterProfile->GetAppearance();
292  Dbg_Assert( pAppearance );
293  Gfx::CFaceTexture* pFaceTexture = pAppearance->GetFaceTexture();
294 
295  Dbg_MsgAssert(pFaceTexture,("NULL pFaceTexture"));
296  Dbg_MsgAssert(pFaceTexture->IsValid(),("Invalid pFaceTexture"));
297 
298  Nx::CTexture* p_texture = Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->LoadTextureFromBuffer(pFaceTexture->GetTextureData(), pFaceTexture->GetTextureSize(), checksum, true, alloc_vram);
299  Dbg_MsgAssert( p_texture, ( "Appearance has no face texture" ) );
300 
301 
302  return p_texture != NULL;
303 }

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptGenerate32BitImage()

bool Nx::ScriptGenerate32BitImage ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 309

310 {
311  uint32 checksum;
312  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
313  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
314 
315  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
316  if (p_texture)
317  {
318  int value;
319  bool renderable = false;
320  bool store_original = false;
321 
322  if (pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xa5d7cfaa,"renderable"), &value) && (value == 1))
323  {
324  renderable = true;
325  }
326  if (pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xeefaf080,"store_original"), &value) && (value == 1))
327  {
328  store_original = true;
329  }
330 
331  p_texture->Generate32BitImage(renderable, store_original);
332  }
333  else
334  {
335  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to generate 32-bit image", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
336  }
337 
338  return true;
339 }

Перекрестные ссылки Script::FindChecksumName(), Nx::CTexture::Generate32BitImage(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture() и Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptOffsetTexture()

bool Nx::ScriptOffsetTexture ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 350

351 {
352  uint32 checksum;
353  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
354  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
355 
356  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
357  if (p_texture)
358  {
359  int x_offset = 0;
360  int y_offset = 0;
361  bool use_fill_color = false;
362  int r = 128, g = 128, b = 128, a = 128;
363 
364  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xd83d589e,"x_offset"), &x_offset);
365  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x14975800,"y_offset"), &y_offset);
366 
367  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xb7a78c53,"fill_r"), &r);
368  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xda7a68b8,"fill_g"), &g);
369  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xaa109c37,"fill_b"), &b);
370  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x3319cd8d,"fill_a"), &a);
371 
372  Image::RGBA fill_color(r, g, b, a);
373 
374  p_texture->Offset(x_offset, y_offset, use_fill_color, fill_color);
375  }
376  else
377  {
378  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to offset", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
379  }
380 
381  return true;
382 }

Перекрестные ссылки Script::FindChecksumName(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), Nx::CTexture::Offset() и Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptAdjustTextureRegion()

bool Nx::ScriptAdjustTextureRegion ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 393

394 {
395  uint32 checksum;
396  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
397  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
398 
399  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
400  if (p_texture)
401  {
402  int x_pos = 0;
403  int y_pos = 0;
404  int width = p_texture->GetWidth();
405  int height = p_texture->GetHeight();
406  int split_axis = X;
407  int start_point = 0;
408  int end_point = 0;
409 
410  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xfa8972e,"xpos"), &x_pos);
411  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xb714f04b,"ypos"), &y_pos);
412  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x73e5bad0,"width"), &width);
413  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xab21af0,"height"), &height);
414  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xe679982e,"split_axis"), &split_axis);
415  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x3d0f162a,"start_point"), &start_point);
416  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x39c54bde,"end_point"), &end_point);
417 
418  p_texture->AdjustRegion(x_pos, y_pos, width, height, split_axis, start_point, end_point);
419  } else {
420  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to adjust", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
421  }
422 
423  return true;
424 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::CTexture::AdjustRegion(), Script::FindChecksumName(), Nx::CTexture::GetHeight(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), Nx::CTexture::GetWidth(), Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict и X.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptPullTextureToEdge()

bool Nx::ScriptPullTextureToEdge ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 432

433 {
434  uint32 checksum;
435  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
436  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
437 
438  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
439  if (p_texture)
440  {
441  int point = 0;
442  int axis = X;
443  int num_pixels = 0;
444 
445  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x485a0cdb,"point"), &point);
446  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x7af07905,"axis"), &axis);
447  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x88cf948c,"num_pixels"), &num_pixels);
448 
449  p_texture->PullToEdge(point, axis, num_pixels);
450  }
451  else
452  {
453  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to pull", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
454  }
455 
456  return true;
457 }

Перекрестные ссылки Script::FindChecksumName(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), NsPrim::point(), Nx::CTexture::PullToEdge(), Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict и X.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptPushTextureToPoint()

bool Nx::ScriptPushTextureToPoint ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 468

469 {
470  uint32 checksum;
471  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
472  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
473 
474  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
475  if (p_texture)
476  {
477  int point = 0;
478  int axis = X;
479  int num_pixels = 0;
480  bool use_fill_color = false;
481  int r = 128, g = 128, b = 128, a = 128;
482 
483  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x485a0cdb,"point"), &point);
484  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x7af07905,"axis"), &axis);
485  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x88cf948c,"num_pixels"), &num_pixels);
486 
487  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xb7a78c53,"fill_r"), &r);
488  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xda7a68b8,"fill_g"), &g);
489  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xaa109c37,"fill_b"), &b);
490  use_fill_color |= pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0x3319cd8d,"fill_a"), &a);
491 
492  Image::RGBA fill_color(r, g, b, a);
493 
494  p_texture->PushToPoint(point, axis, num_pixels, use_fill_color, fill_color);
495  }
496  else
497  {
498  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to push", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
499  }
500 
501  return true;
502 }

◆ ScriptAdjustTextureHSV()

bool Nx::ScriptAdjustTextureHSV ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 544

545 {
546  uint32 checksum;
547  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(NONAME, &checksum))
548  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
549 
550  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
551  if (p_texture)
552  {
553  float h = 0.0f;
554  float s = 1.0f;
555  float v = 1.0f;
556  int adjust_current = 0;
557  bool force_adjust_current = false;
558 
559  bool got_params;
560  got_params = pParams->GetFloat(CRCD(0x6e94f918,"h"), &h);
561  got_params = pParams->GetFloat(CRCD(0xe4f130f4,"s"), &s) && got_params;
562  got_params = pParams->GetFloat(CRCD(0x949bc47b,"v"), &v) && got_params;
563 
564  Dbg_MsgAssert(got_params, ("Need to supply values for h, s, and v"));
565  Dbg_MsgAssert((h >= 0.0f) && (h <= 360.0f), ("h must be in the range of 0-360"));
566  Dbg_MsgAssert(s >= 0.0f, ("s cannot be negative"));
567 
568  pParams->GetInteger(CRCD(0xc164842a,"adjust_current"), &adjust_current);
569  if (adjust_current == 1)
570  {
571  force_adjust_current = true;
572  }
573 
574  p_texture->AdjustHSV(h, s, v, force_adjust_current);
575  }
576  else
577  {
578  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
579  }
580 
581  return true;
582 }

◆ ScriptCopyTexture()

bool Nx::ScriptCopyTexture ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 586

587 {
588  uint32 checksum;
589  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0x9fbbdb72,"src"), &checksum))
590  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
591 
592  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(checksum);
593  if (p_texture)
594  {
595  uint32 new_checksum;
596  if (pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0x941cbbba,"new"), &new_checksum))
597  {
598  CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->CopyTexture(new_checksum, p_texture);
599  }
600  else
601  {
602  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no new texture specified"));
603  }
604  } else {
605  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to copy", Script::FindChecksumName(checksum)));
606  }
607 
608  return true;
609 }

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptCombineTextures()

bool Nx::ScriptCombineTextures ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 616

617 {
618  uint32 new_checksum = 0;
619  uint32 tex1_checksum;
620  uint32 tex2_checksum;
621  bool gen_palette = true;
622 
623  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0x9fbbdb72,"src"), &tex1_checksum))
624  {
625  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no original source texture specified"));
626  }
627  if (!pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0xe126e035,"top"), &tex2_checksum))
628  {
629  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no top source texture specified"));
630  }
631  pParams->GetChecksum(CRCD(0x941cbbba,"new"), &new_checksum);
632  if (pParams->ContainsFlag(CRCD(0x5905256b,"no_palette_gen")))
633  {
634  gen_palette = false;
635  }
636 
637  CTexture *p_texture1 = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(tex1_checksum);
638  if (p_texture1)
639  {
640  CTexture *p_texture2 = CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->GetTexture(tex2_checksum);
641  if (p_texture2)
642  {
643  if (new_checksum)
644  {
645  // Make new texture
646  CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict->CombineTextures(new_checksum, p_texture1, p_texture2, gen_palette);
647  }
648  else
649  {
650  // Just overwrite original texture
651  p_texture1->CombineTextures(p_texture2, gen_palette);
652  }
653  }
654  else
655  {
656  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to combine", Script::FindChecksumName(tex2_checksum)));
657  }
658  }
659  else
660  {
661  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("Can't find texture %s to combine", Script::FindChecksumName(tex1_checksum)));
662  }
663 
664  return true;
665 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::CTexture::CombineTextures(), Nx::CTexDict::CombineTextures(), Script::FindChecksumName(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture() и Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_sprite_tex_dict.

Граф вызовов:

◆ ScriptLoadParticleTexture()

bool Nx::ScriptLoadParticleTexture ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 667

668 {
669  const char *p_name;
670  if (!pParams->GetText(NONAME, &p_name))
671  Dbg_MsgAssert(0, ("no texture specified"));
672 
673 // Dbg_MsgAssert(*p_name,("%s\n Empty name string for Particle Texture\n",pScript->GetScriptInfo()));
674 
675  if (! *p_name)
676  {
677  Dbg_Message("WARNING: empty name in LoadAllParticleTextures - proabably an old level\n");
678  return false;
679  }
680 
681 
682  CTexture *p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->GetTexture(p_name);
683 
684  bool perm = pParams->ContainsFlag(CRCD(0xd5928f25,"perm"));
685 
686  if (!p_texture)
687  {
688  p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->LoadTexture(p_name, true, true, perm);
689  }
690  else
691  {
692  // The testure is already there
693  // if we are on CD, we assume that's the one we want to load
694  // but if not, then we assume we want to re-load the texture
695  // for quick previewing by artists
696  // so we unload it, and load it up agian
697  #ifdef __PLAT_NGPS__
698  if (!Config::CD())
699  {
700  if (Config::gGotExtraMemory)
701  {
702  // If we have the extra memory, then use that
703  // to avoid fragmentation when testing variants of perm textures
704  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext(Mem::Manager::sHandle().DebugHeap());
705  }
706  perm = p_texture->IsPerm();
707  CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->UnloadTexture(p_texture);
708  p_texture = CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->LoadTexture(p_name, true, true, perm);
709  if (Config::gGotExtraMemory)
710  {
711  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
712  }
713  }
714  #endif
715  }
716 
717  return p_texture != NULL;
718 }

Перекрестные ссылки Config::CD(), Dbg_Message(), Nx::CTexDict::GetTexture(), Config::gGotExtraMemory, Nx::CTexture::IsPerm(), Nx::CTexDict::LoadTexture(), Mem::Manager::PopContext(), Mem::Manager::PushContext(), Mem::Manager::sHandle(), Nx::CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict и Nx::CTexDict::UnloadTexture().

)

См. определение в файле NxTexMan.cpp строка 723

737  }

773  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__

775  Lst::HashTable<CTexture> * p_textures = CTexDictManager::sp_particle_tex_dict->GetTexLookup();
776  p_textures->PrintContents();

786  p_tex->GetHeight(),
787  p_tex->GetName()
788  );
789

791  }
792  #endif
793 
794  return true;

◆ s_convert_filename_to_checksum()

23 {

25  int idx = strlen(pFileName);
26  while ((idx > 0) && pFileName[idx - 1] != '\\' && pFileName[idx - 1] != '/')
27  --idx;
28 
29  const char *p_base_name = &(pFileName[idx]);
30 
31  return Crc::GenerateCRCFromString(p_base_name);

596 bool ScriptGetScreenMode(Script::CScriptStructure *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
597 {

600 
601  p_return_params = pScript->GetParams();
602  switch( CViewportManager::sGetScreenMode())
603  {
604  case vSPLIT_V:
605  p_return_params->AddChecksum( "screen_mode", Script::GenerateCRC( "split_vertical" ));
606  break;

630 
631 // @script | Set2DIn3DSpaceParams | Sets the parameters for the 2D Screen Elements in 3D space
632 // @parmopt float | noscale_distance | 100.0 | Distance at which the 3D scale is equal to 1.0 (in inches)
633 // @parmopt float | max_scale | 3.0 | Maximum 3D scale
634 // @parmopt float | min_scale | 0.0 | Minimum 3D scale
635 bool ScriptSet2DIn3DSpaceParams(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)

645  {
646  CViewportManager::sSet2DIn3DSpaceMaxScale(scale);
647  }
648

◆ frustum_project_box()

static void Nx::frustum_project_box ( Mth::CBBox &  bbox,
XGMATRIX *  p_view_matrix,
Mth::Vector *  p_max_x,
Mth::Vector *  p_max_y,
Mth::Vector *  p_mid 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_NxImposter.cpp строка 22

23 {
24  float max_projected_xx, max_projected_xz; // The camera space position of the point with the greatest x axis value when projected to z = mid_z.
25  float max_projected_x_mid_z; // The projected x axis value when this point is projected to z = mid_z;
26 
27  float max_projected_yy, max_projected_yz; // The camera space position of the point furthest along the y axis when projected to z = mid_z.
28  float max_projected_y_mid_z; // The projected y axis value when this point is projected to z = mid_z;
29 
30  float min_x = bbox.GetMin().GetX();
31  float min_y = bbox.GetMin().GetY();
32  float min_z = bbox.GetMin().GetZ();
33  float max_x = bbox.GetMax().GetX();
34  float max_y = bbox.GetMax().GetY();
35  float max_z = bbox.GetMax().GetZ();
36 
37  // Project the midpoint of the box, since this is the point through which the imposter polygon will pass.
38  XGVECTOR3 mid_in( min_x + ( 0.5f * ( max_x - min_x )), min_y + ( 0.5f * ( max_y - min_y )), min_z + ( 0.5f * ( max_z - min_z )));
39  XGVECTOR4 mid_out;
40  XGVec3Transform( &mid_out, &mid_in, p_view_matrix );
41 
42  for( uint32 v = 0; v < 8; ++v )
43  {
44  XGVECTOR3 in;
45  XGVECTOR4 out;
46 
47  in.x = ( v & 0x04 ) ? max_x : min_x;
48  in.y = ( v & 0x02 ) ? max_y : min_y;
49  in.z = ( v & 0x01 ) ? max_z : min_z;
50 
51  XGVec3Transform( &out, &in, p_view_matrix );
52 
53  out.x = fabsf( out.x );
54  out.y = fabsf( out.y );
55 
56  float projected_x_mid_z = out.x * ( mid_out.z / out.z );
57  float projected_y_mid_z = out.y * ( mid_out.z / out.z );
58 
59  if( v == 0 )
60  {
61  max_projected_x_mid_z = projected_x_mid_z;
62  max_projected_xx = out.x;
63  max_projected_xz = out.z;
64 
65  max_projected_y_mid_z = projected_y_mid_z;
66  max_projected_yy = out.y;
67  max_projected_yz = out.z;
68  }
69  else
70  {
71  if( projected_x_mid_z > max_projected_x_mid_z )
72  {
73  max_projected_xx = out.x;
74  max_projected_xz = out.z;
75  max_projected_x_mid_z = projected_x_mid_z;
76  }
77 
78  if( projected_y_mid_z > max_projected_y_mid_z )
79  {
80  max_projected_yy = out.y;
81  max_projected_yz = out.z;
82  max_projected_y_mid_z = projected_y_mid_z;
83  }
84  }
85  }
86 
87  p_max_x->Set( max_projected_xx, 0.0f, max_projected_xz, 0.0f );
88  p_max_y->Set( 0.0f, max_projected_yy, max_projected_yz, 0.0f );
89  p_mid->Set( mid_out.x, mid_out.y, mid_out.z );
90 }

Перекрестные ссылки Mth::CBBox::GetMax(), Mth::CBBox::GetMin(), Mth::Vector::GetX(), Mth::Vector::GetY(), Mth::Vector::GetZ() и Mth::Vector::Set().

Используется в Nx::CXboxImposterGroup::plat_create_imposter_polygon() и Nx::CXboxImposterGroup::plat_update_imposter_polygon().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ loadingBarTimerCallback()

void CALLBACK Nx::loadingBarTimerCallback ( UINT  uTimerID,

)

См. определение в файле p_NxLoadScreen.cpp строка 45

46 {
47  if( NxXbox::EngineGlobals.loadingbar_timer_event != 0 )
48  {
49  loadingBarCurrentSeconds += loadingBarDeltaSeconds;
50  float mult = loadingBarCurrentSeconds / loadingBarTotalSeconds;
51  mult = ( mult > 1.0f ) ? 1.0f : mult;
52  int bar_width = (int)( loadingBarWidth * mult );
53 
54  // Get pointer to front buffer memory.
55  IDirect3DSurface8 *p_buffer;
56  D3DLOCKED_RECT locked_rect;
57  NxXbox::EngineGlobals.p_Device->GetBackBuffer( -1, D3DBACKBUFFER_TYPE_MONO, &p_buffer );
58  p_buffer->LockRect( &locked_rect, NULL, D3DLOCK_TILED );
59  uint32 *p_screen = (uint32*)locked_rect.pBits;
60 
61  // ----------------------------------
62  // | |||||||||||||||||||||| |
63  // ----------------------------------
64  // ^ ^ ^ ^
65  // a b c d
66  //
67  // a = surround start
68  // b = bar start
69  // c = bar end
70  // d = surround end
71  int bar_start = ( 640 - loadingBarWidth ) / 2;
72  int surround_start = bar_start - 5;
73  int bar_end = bar_start + bar_width;
74  int surround_end = surround_start + loadingBarWidth + 10;
75 
76  const int HDTV_OFFSET = 48;
77 
78  bar_start = (int)SCREEN_CONV_X( bar_start );
79  surround_start = (int)SCREEN_CONV_X( surround_start );
80  bar_end = (int)SCREEN_CONV_X( bar_end );
81  surround_end = (int)SCREEN_CONV_X( surround_end );
82 
83  if( NxXbox::EngineGlobals.backbuffer_width > 640 )
84  {
85  bar_start += HDTV_OFFSET;
86  surround_start += HDTV_OFFSET;
87  bar_end += HDTV_OFFSET;
88  surround_end += HDTV_OFFSET;
89  }
90 
91  int base_y = (int)SCREEN_CONV_Y( 410 );
92 
93  for( int i = 0; i < 20; ++i )
94  {
95  uint32 *p_loop = p_screen + (( base_y + i ) * NxXbox::EngineGlobals.backbuffer_width );
96 
97  if(( i < 5 ) || ( i >= 15 ))
98  {
99  for( int j = surround_start; j < surround_end; ++j )
100  p_loop[j] = loadingBarBorderColor;
101  }
102  else
103  {
104  for( int j = surround_start; j < ( surround_start + 5 ); ++j )
105  p_loop[j] = loadingBarBorderColor;
106 
107  for( int j = bar_end; j < surround_end; ++j )
108  p_loop[j] = loadingBarBorderColor;
109 
110  for( int j = bar_start; j < bar_end; ++j )
111  {
112  uint32 idx = ( j - bar_start >= 1279 ) ? 1279 : ( j - bar_start );
113  uint32 write_value = 0x80000000UL | ( loadingBarColors[idx][0] << 16 ) | ( loadingBarColors[idx][1] << 8 ) | ( loadingBarColors[idx][2] << 0 );
114  p_loop[j] = write_value;
115  }
116  }
117  }
118  }
119 }

◆ cmp() [2/2]

static int Nx::cmp ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_NxMesh.cpp строка 31

32 {
33  NxXbox::sCASData *p_casdata1 = (NxXbox::sCASData*)p1;
34  NxXbox::sCASData *p_casdata2 = (NxXbox::sCASData*)p2;
35 
36  uint32 mesh1 = p_casdata1->data0 >> 16;
37  uint32 mesh2 = p_casdata2->data0 >> 16;
38 
39  if( mesh1 > mesh2 )
40  {
41  return 1;
42  }
43  else if( mesh1 < mesh2 )
44  {
45  return -1;
46  }
47  else
48  {
49  uint32 indexzero1 = p_casdata1->data0 & 0xFFFF;
50  uint32 indexzero2 = p_casdata2->data0 & 0xFFFF;
51  if( indexzero1 > indexzero2 )
52  {
53  return 1;
54  }
55  else if( indexzero1 < indexzero2 )
56  {
57  return -1;
58  }
59  }
60  return 0;
61 }
