◆ getDetailsForTextureSplat() [3/3]

sXboxSplatInstanceDetails* Nx::getDetailsForTextureSplat ( NxXbox::sTexture *  p_texture)

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 113

114 {
115  sXboxSplatInstanceDetails *p_xbox_details;
116 
117  Dbg_Assert( p_splat_details_table );
118 
119  // Check to see whether we have a scene already created for this type of texture splat.
120  p_splat_details_table->IterateStart();
121  sSplatInstanceDetails *p_details = p_splat_details_table->IterateNext();
122  while( p_details )
123  {
124  p_xbox_details = static_cast<sXboxSplatInstanceDetails*>( p_details );
125  NxXbox::sMaterial *p_material = p_xbox_details->mp_material;
126  if( p_material->mp_tex[0] == p_texture )
127  {
128  // This scene contains a material with the required texture, so use this scene.
129  return p_xbox_details;
130  }
131  p_details = p_splat_details_table->IterateNext();
132  }
133 
134  // Create an (opaque) material used to render the mesh.
135  NxXbox::sMaterial *p_material = new NxXbox::sMaterial();
136  p_material->m_flags[0] = (( p_texture ) ? MATFLAG_TEXTURED : 0 );
137  p_material->m_checksum = (uint32)rand() * (uint32)rand();
138  p_material->m_passes = 1;
139  p_material->mp_tex[0] = p_texture;
140  p_material->m_no_bfc = true;
141  p_material->m_zbias = 1; // To ensure it will sort above most geometry.
142  p_material->m_reg_alpha[0] = 0x00000005UL; // Blend for now.
143  p_material->m_color[0][0] = 0x80;
144  p_material->m_color[0][1] = 0x80;
145  p_material->m_color[0][2] = 0x80;
146  p_material->m_uv_addressing[0] = 0x00020002UL; // We want the texture to border - most efficient for alphakill.
147  p_material->m_k[0] = 0.0f;
148  p_material->m_alpha_cutoff = 1;
149 
150  p_xbox_details = new sXboxSplatInstanceDetails;
151  p_xbox_details->m_highest_active_splat = 0;
152  p_xbox_details->mp_material = p_material;
153  ZeroMemory( p_xbox_details->m_lifetimes, sizeof( int ) * SPLAT_POLYS_PER_MESH );
154 
155  for( int v = 0; v < SPLAT_POLYS_PER_MESH * 3; ++v )
156  {
157  p_xbox_details->m_verts[v].pos = D3DXVECTOR3( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
158  p_xbox_details->m_verts[v].col = D3DCOLOR_RGBA( 0x80, 0x80, 0x80, 0x80 );
159  }
160 
161  p_splat_details_table->PutItem((uint32)p_xbox_details, p_xbox_details );
162 
163  return p_xbox_details;
164 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::sXboxSplatVert::col, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_alpha_cutoff, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_checksum, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_color, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_flags, Nx::sSplatInstanceDetails::m_highest_active_splat, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_k, Nx::sSplatInstanceDetails::m_lifetimes, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_no_bfc, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_passes, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_reg_alpha, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_uv_addressing, Nx::sXboxSplatInstanceDetails::m_verts, NxXbox::sMaterial::m_zbias, Nx::sXboxSplatInstanceDetails::mp_material, NxXbox::sMaterial::mp_tex, p_splat_details_table и Nx::sXboxSplatVert::pos.

◆ subdivide_tri_stack() [3/3]

bool Nx::subdivide_tri_stack ( uint8 **  p_write,
NxXbox::sMesh *  p_mesh 
)

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 172

173 {
174  // Three temporary buffers.
175  static uint8 v0[128];
176  static uint8 v1[128];
177  static uint8 v2[128];
178 
179  // Three more temporary buffers.
180  static uint8 i01[128];
181  static uint8 i12[128];
182  static uint8 i20[128];
183 
184  // If there are elements on the stack, pop off the top three vertices and subdivide if necessary.
185  if( triSubdivideStack.IsEmpty())
186  {
187  return false;
188  }
189 
190  D3DXVECTOR3 *p_v0 = (D3DXVECTOR3*)v0;
191  D3DXVECTOR3 *p_v1 = (D3DXVECTOR3*)v1;
192  D3DXVECTOR3 *p_v2 = (D3DXVECTOR3*)v2;
193 
194  // Stack is LIFO, so Pop() off in reverse order.
195  triSubdivideStack.Pop( p_v2 );
196  triSubdivideStack.Pop( p_v1 );
197  triSubdivideStack.Pop( p_v0 );
198 
199  // Calculate the area of this tri.
200  Mth::Vector p( p_v1->x - p_v0->x, p_v1->y - p_v0->y, p_v1->z - p_v0->z );
201  Mth::Vector q( p_v2->x - p_v0->x, p_v2->y - p_v0->y, p_v2->z - p_v0->z );
202  Mth::Vector r(( p[Y] * q[Z] ) - ( q[Y] * p[Z] ), ( p[Z] * q[X] ) - ( q[Z] * p[X] ), ( p[X] * q[Y] ) - ( q[X] * p[Y] ));
203  float area_squared = r.LengthSqr();
204 
205  if( area_squared > shatterAreaTest )
206  {
207  // We need to subdivide this tri. Calculate the three intermediate points.
208  int block_size = triSubdivideStack.GetBlockSize();
209 
210  memcpy( i01, v0, block_size );
211  memcpy( i12, v1, block_size );
212  memcpy( i20, v2, block_size );
213 
214  // Deal with positions (always present).
215  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i01 )->x = p_v0->x + (( p_v1->x - p_v0->x ) * 0.5f );
216  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i01 )->y = p_v0->y + (( p_v1->y - p_v0->y ) * 0.5f );
217  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i01 )->z = p_v0->z + (( p_v1->z - p_v0->z ) * 0.5f );
218 
219  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i12 )->x = p_v1->x + (( p_v2->x - p_v1->x ) * 0.5f );
220  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i12 )->y = p_v1->y + (( p_v2->y - p_v1->y ) * 0.5f );
221  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i12 )->z = p_v1->z + (( p_v2->z - p_v1->z ) * 0.5f );
222 
223  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i20 )->x = p_v2->x + (( p_v0->x - p_v2->x ) * 0.5f );
224  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i20 )->y = p_v2->y + (( p_v0->y - p_v2->y ) * 0.5f );
225  ((D3DXVECTOR3*)i20 )->z = p_v2->z + (( p_v0->z - p_v2->z ) * 0.5f );
226 
227  // Deal with colors (not always present).
228  if( p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset > 0 )
229  {
230  uint8 *p_v0col = (uint8*)( v0 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
231  uint8 *p_v1col = (uint8*)( v1 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
232  uint8 *p_v2col = (uint8*)( v2 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
233  uint8 *p_i01col = (uint8*)( i01 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
234  uint8 *p_i12col = (uint8*)( i12 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
235  uint8 *p_i20col = (uint8*)( i20 + p_mesh->m_diffuse_offset );
236 
237  for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
238  {
239  p_i01col[i] = p_v0col[i] + (((int)p_v1col[i] - (int)p_v0col[i] ) / 2 );
240  p_i12col[i] = p_v1col[i] + (((int)p_v2col[i] - (int)p_v1col[i] ) / 2 );
241  p_i20col[i] = p_v2col[i] + (((int)p_v0col[i] - (int)p_v2col[i] ) / 2 );
242  }
243  }
244 
245  // Deal with uv0 (not always present).
246  if( p_mesh->m_uv0_offset > 0 )
247  {
248  float *p_v0uv = (float*)( v0 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
249  float *p_v1uv = (float*)( v1 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
250  float *p_v2uv = (float*)( v2 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
251  float *p_i01uv = (float*)( i01 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
252  float *p_i12uv = (float*)( i12 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
253  float *p_i20uv = (float*)( i20 + p_mesh->m_uv0_offset );
254 
255  for( int i = 0; i < 2; ++i )
256  {
257  p_i01uv[i] = p_v0uv[i] + (( p_v1uv[i] - p_v0uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
258  p_i12uv[i] = p_v1uv[i] + (( p_v2uv[i] - p_v1uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
259  p_i20uv[i] = p_v2uv[i] + (( p_v0uv[i] - p_v2uv[i] ) * 0.5f );
260  }
261  }
262 
263  // Push the four new tris onto the stack.
264  triSubdivideStack.Push( v0 );
265  triSubdivideStack.Push( i01 );
266  triSubdivideStack.Push( i20 );
267 
268  triSubdivideStack.Push( i01 );
269  triSubdivideStack.Push( v1 );
270  triSubdivideStack.Push( i12 );
271 
272  triSubdivideStack.Push( i01 );
273  triSubdivideStack.Push( i12 );
274  triSubdivideStack.Push( i20 );
275 
276  triSubdivideStack.Push( i20 );
277  triSubdivideStack.Push( i12 );
278  triSubdivideStack.Push( v2 );
279  }
280  else
281  {
282  // Don't need to subdivide this tri.
283  int block_size = triSubdivideStack.GetBlockSize();
284 
285  // Just copy the tri into the next available slot.
286  memcpy( *p_write, v0, block_size );
287  *p_write += block_size;
288  memcpy( *p_write, v1, block_size );
289  *p_write += block_size;
290  memcpy( *p_write, v2, block_size );
291  *p_write += block_size;
292  }
293  return true;
294 }

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::GetBlockSize(), Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::IsEmpty(), Mth::Vector::LengthSqr(), NxXbox::sMesh::m_diffuse_offset, NxXbox::sMesh::m_uv0_offset, Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::Pop(), Nx::sTriSubdivideStack::Push(), shatterAreaTest, triSubdivideStack, X, Y и Z.

Граф вызовов:

)

427 {
428  // Assumes for both v1 and v2 that the [z] and [w] components are 0.
429  return ( v1[X] * v2[Y] ) - ( v1[Y] * v2[X] );
430 }

◆ same_side() [3/3]

static bool Nx::same_side ( Mth::Vector &  p1,
Mth::Vector &  p2,
Mth::Vector &  a,
Mth::Vector &  b 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 438

439 {
440  float cp1 = CrossProduct2D( b - a, p1 - a );
441  float cp2 = CrossProduct2D( b - a, p2 - a );
442  if(( cp1 * cp2 ) >= 0.0f )
443  return true;
444  else
445  return false;
446 }

◆ point_in_triangle() [3/3]

static bool Nx::point_in_triangle ( Mth::Vector &  p,
Mth::Vector &  a,
Mth::Vector &  b,
Mth::Vector &  c 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 454

455 {
456  if( same_side( p, a, b, c ) && same_side( p, b, c, a ) && same_side( p, c, a, b ))
457  return true;
458  else

Граф вызовов:

◆ line_segment_intersection() [3/3]

static bool Nx::line_segment_intersection ( float  x1,
float  y1,
float  x2,
float  y2,
float  x3,
float  y3,
float  x4,
float  y4 
)
inlinestatic

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 471

472 {
473  float ax = x2 - x1;
474  float bx = x3 - x4;
475  float ay = y2 - y1;
476  float by = y3 - y4;
477  float cx = x1 - x3;
478  float cy = y1 - y3;
479  float d = by * cx - bx * cy; // Alpha numerator.
480  float f = ay * bx - ax * by; // Both denominator.
481 
482  // Alpha tests.
483  if( f > 0.0f )
484  {
485  if( d < 0.0f || d > f )
486  return false;
487  }
488  else
489  {
490  if( d > 0 || d < f )
491  return false;
492  }
493 
494  float e = ax * cy - ay * cx; // Beta numerator.
495 
496  // Beta tests.
497  if( f > 0.0f )
498  {
499  if( e < 0.0f || e > f )
500  return false;
501  }
502  else
503  {
504  if( e > 0 || e < f )
505  return false;
506  }
507 
508  return true;
509 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxPs2::render::cx и NxPs2::render::cy.

◆ tri_texture_intersect() [3/3]

static bool Nx::tri_texture_intersect ( float  u0,
float  v0,
float  u1,
float  v1,
float  u2,
float  v2 
)
inlinestatic

См. определение в файле p_nxmiscfx.cpp строка 517

518 {
519  // Trivial check to see if all three points are outside range of texture.
520  if(( u0 < -1.0f ) && ( u1 < -1.0f ) && ( u2 < -1.0f ))
521  return false;
522  if(( u0 > 1.0f ) && ( u1 > 1.0f ) && ( u2 > 1.0f ))
523  return false;
524  if(( v0 < -1.0f ) && ( v1 < -1.0f ) && ( v2 < -1.0f ))
525  return false;
526  if(( v0 > 1.0f ) && ( v1 > 1.0f ) && ( v2 > 1.0f ))
527  return false;
528 
529  // Perform the check to see if any line segment forming the tri intersects any line segment forming the texture.
530  Mth::Vector texture_square[4] = { Mth::Vector( -1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
531  Mth::Vector( 1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
532  Mth::Vector( 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f ),
533  Mth::Vector( -1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f )};
534  for( int p = 0; p < 4; ++p )
535  {
536  int q = ( p + 1 ) % 4;
537  if( line_segment_intersection( u0, v0, u1, v1, texture_square[p][X], texture_square[p][Y], texture_square[q][X], texture_square[q][Y] ))
538  return true;
539  if( line_segment_intersection( u1, v1, u2, v2, texture_square[p][X], texture_square[p][Y], texture_square[q][X], texture_square[q][Y] ))
540  return true;
541  if( line_segment_intersection( u2, v2, u0, v0, texture_square[p][X], texture_square[p][Y], texture_square[q][X], texture_square[q][Y] ))
542  return true;
543  }
544 
545  // If we reach this point there are three remaining possibilities:
546  // 1) That the tri lies entirely within the texture
547  // 2) That the texture lies entirely within the tri
548  // 3) That there is no space shared by tri and texture
549 
550  // 1) Perform a trivial check to see whether a corner of the tri lies within the texture.
551  if(( u0 >= -1.0f ) && ( u0 <= 1.0f ) && ( v0 >= -1.0f ) && ( v0 <= 1.0f ))
552  return true;
553  if(( u1 >= -1.0f ) && ( u1 <= 1.0f ) && ( v1 >= -1.0f ) && ( v1 <= 1.0f ))
554  return true;
555  if(( u2 >= -1.0f ) && ( u2 <= 1.0f ) && ( v2 >= -1.0f ) && ( v2 <= 1.0f ))
556  return true;
557 
558  // 2) Check that at least one corner of the texture falls within the tri.
559  Mth::Vector a( u0, v0, 0.0f );
560  Mth::Vector b( u1, v1, 0.0f );
561  Mth::Vector c( u2, v2, 0.0f );
562  for( int p = 0; p < 4; ++p )
563  {
564  if( point_in_triangle( texture_square[p], a, b, c ))
565  {
566  return true;
567  }
568  }
569 
570  // 3) No space shared.
571  return false;
572 }

Перекрестные ссылки line_segment_intersection(), point_in_triangle(), Vector(), X и Y.

Граф вызовов:

◆ seed_particle_rnd()

static void Nx::seed_particle_rnd ( int  s,
int  a,
int  b 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_nxnewparticle.cpp строка 96

◆ particle_rnd()

static int Nx::particle_rnd ( int  n)
inlinestatic

См. определение в файле p_nxnewparticle.cpp строка 109

111  {
112  rand_seed = rand_seed * rand_a + rand_b;
113  rand_a = ( rand_a ^ rand_seed ) + ( rand_seed >> 4 );
114  rand_b += ( rand_seed >> 3 ) - 0x10101010L;
115  }

Перекрестные ссылки rand_a, rand_b и rand_seed.

◆ FtoDW()

DWORD Nx::FtoDW ( FLOAT  f)
inline

См. определение в файле p_nxnewparticle.cpp строка 143

144 {

Перекрестные ссылки Nx::CXboxNewParticle::mp_newest_stream и Nx::CXboxNewParticle::mp_stream.

Используется в Nx::CXboxWeather::plat_render_snow().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ LoadTextureFileFromMemory() [2/2]

Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > * Nx::LoadTextureFileFromMemory ( void **  pp_mem,
Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > *  p_texture_table,
bool  okay_to_rebuild_texture_table 
)

См. определение в файле p_nxtexture.cpp строка 395

396 {
397  uint8 *p_data = (uint8*)( *pp_mem );
398 
399  // Read the texture file version and number of textures.
400  int version, num_textures;
401  MemoryRead( &version, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
402  MemoryRead( &num_textures, sizeof( int ), 1, p_data );
403 
404  // If allowed, rebuild the texture table to the optimum size, using the same heap as the original table.
405  if( okay_to_rebuild_texture_table )
406  {
407  uint32 optimal_table_size = num_textures * 2;
408  uint32 test = 2;
409  uint32 size = 1;
410  for( ;; test <<= 1, ++size )
411  {
412  // Check if this iteration of table size is sufficient, or if we have hit the maximum size.
413  if(( optimal_table_size <= test ) || ( size >= 12 ))
414  {
415  Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader* p_bheader = Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader::sRead( p_texture_table );
416  Mem::Allocator* p_allocater = p_bheader->mpAlloc;
417 
418  delete p_texture_table;
419 
420  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext( p_allocater );
421  p_texture_table = new Lst::HashTable<Nx::CTexture>( size );
422  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
423  break;
424  }
425  }
426  }
427 
428  for( int t = 0; t < num_textures; ++t )
429  {
430  // Create the engine level texture.
431  NxXbox::sTexture *p_texture = new NxXbox::sTexture;
432 
433  uint32 base_width, base_height, levels, texel_depth, palette_depth, dxt, palette_size;
434  MemoryRead( &p_texture->Checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
435  MemoryRead( &base_width, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
436  MemoryRead( &base_height, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
437  MemoryRead( &levels, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
438  MemoryRead( &texel_depth, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
439  MemoryRead( &palette_depth, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
440  MemoryRead( &dxt, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
441  MemoryRead( &palette_size, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
442 
443  p_texture->BaseWidth = (uint16)base_width;
444  p_texture->BaseHeight = (uint16)base_height;
445  p_texture->Levels = (uint8)levels;
446  p_texture->TexelDepth = (uint8)texel_depth;
447  p_texture->PaletteDepth = (uint8)palette_depth;
448  p_texture->DXT = (uint8)dxt;
449 
450  D3DFORMAT texture_format;
451  if( p_texture->DXT > 0 )
452  {
453  if(( p_texture->DXT == 1 ) || ( p_texture->DXT == 2 ))
454  {
455  texture_format = D3DFMT_DXT1;
456  }
457  else if( p_texture->DXT == 5 )
458  {
459  texture_format = D3DFMT_DXT5;
460  }
461  else
462  {
463  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
464  }
465  }
466  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 8 )
467  {
468  texture_format = D3DFMT_P8;
469  }
470  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 16 )
471  {
472  texture_format = D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5; // Could also be X1R5G5B5;
473  }
474  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 32 )
475  {
476  texture_format = D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8;
477  }
478  else
479  {
480  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
481  }
482 
483  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateTexture( p_texture->BaseWidth, p_texture->BaseHeight, p_texture->Levels, 0, texture_format, 0, &p_texture->pD3DTexture ))
484  {
485  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
486  }
487 
488  if( palette_size > 0 )
489  {
490  // Create and lock the palette.
491  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreatePalette( palette_size == ( 256 * sizeof( D3DCOLOR )) ? D3DPALETTE_256 : D3DPALETTE_32, &p_texture->pD3DPalette ))
492  {
493  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
494  }
495  else
496  {
497  D3DCOLOR* p_colors;
498  if( D3D_OK != p_texture->pD3DPalette->Lock( &p_colors, 0 ))
499  {
500  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
501  }
502  else
503  {
504  // Read in palette data.
505  MemoryRead( p_colors, palette_size, 1, p_data );
506  }
507  }
508  }
509  else
510  {
511  p_texture->pD3DPalette = NULL;
512  }
513 
514  for( uint32 mip_level = 0; mip_level < p_texture->Levels; ++mip_level )
515  {
516  uint32 texture_level_data_size;
517  MemoryRead( &texture_level_data_size, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_data );
518 
519  D3DLOCKED_RECT locked_rect;
520  if( D3D_OK != p_texture->pD3DTexture->LockRect( mip_level, &locked_rect, NULL, 0 ))
521  {
522  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
523  }
524  else
525  {
526  MemoryRead( locked_rect.pBits, texture_level_data_size, 1, p_data );
527  }
528  }
529 
530  // Add this texture to the table.
531  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = new Nx::CXboxTexture();
532  p_xbox_texture->SetEngineTexture( p_texture );
533  p_texture_table->PutItem( p_texture->Checksum, p_xbox_texture );
534  }
535  return p_texture_table;
536 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxXbox::sTexture::BaseHeight, NxXbox::sTexture::BaseWidth, NxXbox::sTexture::Checksum, NxXbox::sTexture::DXT, NxXbox::sTexture::Levels, Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader::mpAlloc, Gfx::p_data, NxXbox::sTexture::PaletteDepth, NxXbox::sTexture::pD3DPalette, NxXbox::sTexture::pD3DTexture, Mem::Manager::PopContext(), Mem::Manager::PushContext(), Lst::HashTable< _V >::PutItem(), Nx::CXboxTexture::SetEngineTexture(), Mem::Manager::sHandle(), Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader::sRead() и NxXbox::sTexture::TexelDepth.

Граф вызовов:

◆ LoadTextureFile() [2/2]

Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > * Nx::LoadTextureFile ( const char *  Filename,
Lst::HashTable< Nx::CTexture > *  p_texture_table,
bool  okay_to_rebuild_texture_table 
)

См. определение в файле p_nxtexture.cpp строка 544

545 {
546  // Open the texture file.
547  void *p_FH = File::Open( Filename, "rb" );
548  if( !p_FH )
549  {
550  Dbg_Message( "Couldn't open texture file %s\n", Filename );
551  return p_texture_table;
552  }
553 
554  // Read the texture file version and number of textures.
555  int version, num_textures;
556  File::Read( &version, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
557  File::Read( &num_textures, sizeof( int ), 1, p_FH );
558 
559  // If allowed, rebuild the texture table to the optimum size, using the same heap as the original table.
560  if( okay_to_rebuild_texture_table )
561  {
562  uint32 optimal_table_size = num_textures * 2;
563  uint32 test = 2;
564  uint32 size = 1;
565  for( ;; test <<= 1, ++size )
566  {
567  // Check if this iteration of table size is sufficient, or if we have hit the maximum size.
568  if(( optimal_table_size <= test ) || ( size >= 12 ))
569  {
570  Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader* p_bheader = Mem::Allocator::BlockHeader::sRead( p_texture_table );
571  Mem::Allocator* p_allocater = p_bheader->mpAlloc;
572 
573  delete p_texture_table;
574 
575  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PushContext( p_allocater );
576  p_texture_table = new Lst::HashTable<Nx::CTexture>( size );
577  Mem::Manager::sHandle().PopContext();
578  break;
579  }
580  }
581  }
582 
583  for( int t = 0; t < num_textures; ++t )
584  {
585  // Create the engine level texture.
586  NxXbox::sTexture *p_texture = new NxXbox::sTexture;
587 
588  uint32 base_width, base_height, levels, texel_depth, palette_depth, dxt, palette_size;
589  File::Read( &p_texture->Checksum, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
590  File::Read( &base_width, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
591  File::Read( &base_height, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
592  File::Read( &levels, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
593  File::Read( &texel_depth, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
594  File::Read( &palette_depth, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
595  File::Read( &dxt, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
596  File::Read( &palette_size, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
597 
598  p_texture->BaseWidth = (uint16)base_width;
599  p_texture->BaseHeight = (uint16)base_height;
600  p_texture->Levels = (uint8)levels;
601  p_texture->TexelDepth = (uint8)texel_depth;
602  p_texture->PaletteDepth = (uint8)palette_depth;
603  p_texture->DXT = (uint8)dxt;
604 
605  D3DFORMAT texture_format;
606  if( p_texture->DXT > 0 )
607  {
608  if(( p_texture->DXT == 1 ) || ( p_texture->DXT == 2 ))
609  {
610  texture_format = D3DFMT_DXT1;
611  }
612  else if( p_texture->DXT == 5 )
613  {
614  texture_format = D3DFMT_DXT5;
615  }
616  else
617  {
618  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
619  }
620  }
621  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 8 )
622  {
623  texture_format = D3DFMT_P8;
624  }
625  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 16 )
626  {
627  texture_format = D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5; // Could also be X1R5G5B5;
628  }
629  else if( p_texture->TexelDepth == 32 )
630  {
631  texture_format = D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8;
632  }
633  else
634  {
635  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
636  }
637 
638  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreateTexture( p_texture->BaseWidth, p_texture->BaseHeight, p_texture->Levels, 0, texture_format, 0, &p_texture->pD3DTexture ))
639  {
640  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
641  }
642 
643  if( palette_size > 0 )
644  {
645  // Create and lock the palette.
646  if( D3D_OK != D3DDevice_CreatePalette( palette_size == ( 256 * sizeof( D3DCOLOR )) ? D3DPALETTE_256 : D3DPALETTE_32, &p_texture->pD3DPalette ))
647  {
648  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
649  }
650  else
651  {
652  D3DCOLOR* p_colors;
653  if( D3D_OK != p_texture->pD3DPalette->Lock( &p_colors, 0 ))
654  {
655  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
656  }
657  else
658  {
659  // Read in palette data.
660  File::Read( p_colors, palette_size, 1, p_FH );
661  }
662  }
663  }
664  else
665  {
666  p_texture->pD3DPalette = NULL;
667  }
668 
669  for( uint32 mip_level = 0; mip_level < p_texture->Levels; ++mip_level )
670  {
671  uint32 texture_level_data_size;
672  File::Read( &texture_level_data_size, sizeof( uint32 ), 1, p_FH );
673 
674  D3DLOCKED_RECT locked_rect;
675  if( D3D_OK != p_texture->pD3DTexture->LockRect( mip_level, &locked_rect, NULL, 0 ))
676  {
677  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
678  }
679  else
680  {
681  File::Read( locked_rect.pBits, texture_level_data_size, 1, p_FH );
682  }
683  }
684 
685  // Add this texture to the table.
686  Nx::CXboxTexture *p_xbox_texture = new Nx::CXboxTexture();
687  p_xbox_texture->SetEngineTexture( p_texture );
688  p_texture_table->PutItem( p_texture->Checksum, p_xbox_texture );
689  }
690  File::Close( p_FH );
691 
692  return p_texture_table;
693 }

◆ ScriptNgc_Message()

bool Nx::ScriptNgc_Message ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле p_display.cpp строка 1727

1728 {
1729  NxNgc::SText message;
1730  Nx::CFont * p_cfont;
1731  const char * p_font_name = NULL;
1732  const char * p_text = NULL;
1733 
1734  if ( !pParams->GetString( "font", &p_font_name ) ) return false;
1735  if ( !pParams->GetString( "text", &p_text ) ) return false;
1736  float y = lasty;
1737  pParams->GetFloat( "y", &y );
1738 
1739  // We can only draw a text string if we have a font & a string.
1740  if ( p_font_name && p_text )
1741  {
1742  p_cfont = Nx::CFontManager::sGetFont( p_font_name );
1743  if ( !p_cfont )
1744  {
1745  Nx::CFontManager::sLoadFont( p_font_name );
1746  p_cfont = Nx::CFontManager::sGetFont( p_font_name );
1747  if ( !p_cfont ) return true;
1748  }
1749  message.mp_string = (char *)p_text;
1750 
1751  int sr = 128;
1752  int sg = 128;
1753  int sb = 128;
1754  int sa = 255;
1755  pParams->GetInteger( "r", &sr );
1756  pParams->GetInteger( "g", &sg );
1757  pParams->GetInteger( "b", &sb );
1758  pParams->GetInteger( "a", &sa );
1759  message.m_rgba = sa | ( sb << 8 ) | ( sg << 16 ) | ( sr << 24 );
1760 
1761  Nx::CNgcFont * p_nfont = static_cast<Nx::CNgcFont*>( p_cfont );
1762  NxNgc::SFont * p_font = p_nfont->GetEngineFont();
1763  message.mp_font = p_font;
1764  float w, h;
1765  if ( p_font )
1766  {
1767  float x = 0.0f;
1768  message.m_ypos = y;
1769  float scale = 1.0f;
1770  pParams->GetFloat( "scale", &scale );
1771  message.m_xscale = scale;
1772  message.m_yscale = scale;
1773  message.m_color_override = false;
1774 
1775  p_font->QueryString( message.mp_string, w, h );
1776  if ( pParams->GetFloat( "x", &x ) )
1777  {
1778  message.m_xpos = x;
1779  }
1780  else
1781  {
1782  message.m_xpos = ( 640.0f - ( w * scale ) ) / 2.0f;
1783  }
1784 
1785  float appendx = 0.0f;
1786  float appendy = 0.0f;
1787  bool append = false;
1788  if ( pParams->GetFloat( "appendx", &appendx ) || pParams->GetFloat( "appendy", &appendy ) )
1789  {
1790  append = true;
1791  pParams->GetFloat( "appendx", &appendx );
1792  pParams->GetFloat( "appendy", &appendy );
1793  message.m_xpos = prevx + appendx;
1794  message.m_ypos = prevy + appendy;
1795  }
1796 
1797  message.DrawSingle();
1798 
1799  prevx = message.m_xpos + ( w * scale );
1800  prevy = y;
1801 
1802  if ( !append )
1803  {
1804  lasty = y + (float)((int)( h * scale ));
1805  }
1806  }
1807  }
1808 
1809  return true;
1810 }

◆ ScriptNgc_Menu()

bool Nx::ScriptNgc_Menu ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле p_display.cpp строка 1812

1813 {
1814  NxNgc::SText message;
1815  Nx::CFont * p_cfont;
1816  const char * p_font_name = NULL;
1817  int items = 0;
1818  const char * p_item;
1819  char buf[32];
1820  int sr = 128;
1821  int sg = 128;
1822  int sb = 128;
1823  int sa = 255;
1824  int ur = 128;
1825  int ug = 128;
1826  int ub = 128;
1827  int ua = 255;
1828 
1829  pParams->GetString( "font", &p_font_name );
1830  pParams->GetInteger( "items", &items );
1831  pParams->GetInteger( "sr", &sr );
1832  pParams->GetInteger( "sg", &sg );
1833  pParams->GetInteger( "sb", &sb );
1834  pParams->GetInteger( "sa", &sa );
1835  pParams->GetInteger( "ur", &ur );
1836  pParams->GetInteger( "ug", &ug );
1837  pParams->GetInteger( "ub", &ub );
1838  pParams->GetInteger( "ua", &ua );
1839 
1840  // We can only draw a text string if we have a font & a string.
1841  if ( p_font_name && items )
1842  {
1843  Nx::CFontManager::sLoadFont( p_font_name );
1844  p_cfont = Nx::CFontManager::sGetFont( p_font_name );
1845 
1846  for ( int lp = 0; lp < items; lp++ )
1847  {
1848  p_item = NULL;
1849  sprintf( buf, "item%d", lp );
1850  pParams->GetString( buf, &p_item );
1851 
1852  if ( p_item )
1853  {
1854  message.mp_string = (char *)p_item;
1855 
1856  float scale = 1.0f;
1857  pParams->GetFloat( "scale", &scale );
1858 
1859  if ( lp == selection )
1860  {
1861  message.m_rgba = sa | ( sb << 8 ) | ( sg << 16 ) | ( sr << 24 );
1862  }
1863  else
1864  {
1865  message.m_rgba = ua | ( ub << 8 ) | ( ug << 16 ) | ( ur << 24 );
1866  }
1867 
1868  Nx::CNgcFont * p_nfont = static_cast<Nx::CNgcFont*>( p_cfont );
1869  NxNgc::SFont * p_font = p_nfont->GetEngineFont();
1870  message.mp_font = p_font;
1871  float w, h;
1872  p_font->QueryString( message.mp_string, w, h );
1873  message.m_xpos = ( 640.0f - ( w * scale ) ) / 2.0f;
1874  message.m_ypos = lasty;
1875  message.m_xscale = scale;
1876  message.m_yscale = scale;
1877  message.m_color_override = false;
1878 
1879  message.DrawSingle();
1880 
1881  lasty += (float)((int)( h * scale ));
1882  }
1883  }
1884  }
1885 
1886  selection_max = items;
1887 
1888  return true;
1889 }

См. определение в файле p_display.cpp строка 1891

1892 {
1893  OSSetProgressiveMode(1);
1894  NxNgc::EngineGlobals.use_480p = true;
1895  hwReInit( NULL );
1896 
1897  // Must display screen saying that progressive mode has been set.
1898  for ( int lp = 0; lp < 240; lp++ )
1899  {
1900  // Render the text.
1901  NsDisplay::begin();
1902  NsRender::begin();
1903 
1904  NsCamera cam;
1905  cam.orthographic( 0, 0, 640, 448 );
1906 
1907  // Draw the screen.
1908  NsPrim::begin();
1909 
1910  cam.begin();
1911 
1912  GX::SetZMode( GX_FALSE, GX_ALWAYS, GX_TRUE );
1913 
1914  NxNgc::set_blend_mode( NxNgc::vBLEND_MODE_BLEND );
1915 
1916  if ( lp > 60 ) Script::RunScript( "ngc_progressive" );
1917 
1918  NsDisplay::setBackgroundColor( messageColor );
1919 
1920  cam.end();
1921 
1922  NsPrim::end();
1923 
1924  NsRender::end();
1925  NsDisplay::end( true );
1926  }
1927  return true;
1928 }

◆ ScriptNgc_Set60Hz()

bool Nx::ScriptNgc_Set60Hz ( Script::CScriptStructure *  pParams,
Script::CScript *  pScript 
)

См. определение в файле p_display.cpp строка 1938

1939 {
1940  OSSetEuRgb60Mode(1);
1941  NxNgc::EngineGlobals.use_60hz = true;
1942  hwReInit( NULL );
1943 
1944  hwGXInit();
1945  VIConfigure(rmode);
1946 
1947  Config::gFPS = 60;
1948 
1949  // Must display screen saying that 60hz mode has been set.
1950  for ( int lp = 0; lp < 240; lp++ )
1951  {
1952  // Render the text.
1953  NsDisplay::begin();
1954  NsRender::begin();
1955 
1956  NsCamera cam;
1957  cam.orthographic( 0, 0, 640, 448 );
1958 
1959  // Draw the screen.
1960  NsPrim::begin();
1961 
1962  cam.begin();
1963 
1964  GX::SetZMode( GX_FALSE, GX_ALWAYS, GX_TRUE );
1965 
1966  NxNgc::set_blend_mode( NxNgc::vBLEND_MODE_BLEND );
1967 
1968  if ( lp > 60 ) Script::RunScript( "ngc_60Hz" );
1969 
1970  NsDisplay::setBackgroundColor( messageColor );
1971 
1972  cam.end();
1973 
1974  NsPrim::end();
1975 
1976  NsRender::end();
1977  NsDisplay::end( true );
1978  }
1979  return true;
1980 }
